services, yet it remains vulnerable to cyberattacks, unreliable battery-state
predictions, and opaque decision processes that erode trust and performance. To
address these challenges, we introduce a novel Agentic Artificial Intelligence
(AAI) framework tailored for IoEV, where specialized agents collaborate to
deliver autonomous threat mitigation, robust analytics, and interpretable
decision support. Specifically, we design an AAI architecture comprising
dedicated agents for cyber-threat detection and response at charging stations,
real-time State of Charge (SoC) estimation, and State of Health (SoH) anomaly
detection, all coordinated through a shared, explainable reasoning layer;
develop interpretable threat-mitigation mechanisms that proactively identify
and neutralize attacks on both physical charging points and learning
components; propose resilient SoC and SoH models that leverage continuous and
adversarial-aware learning to produce accurate, uncertainty-aware forecasts
with human-readable explanations; and implement a three-agent pipeline, where
each agent uses LLM-driven reasoning and dynamic tool invocation to interpret
intent, contextualize tasks, and execute formal optimizations for user-centric
assistance. Finally, we validate our framework through comprehensive
experiments across diverse IoEV scenarios, demonstrating significant
improvements in security and prediction accuracy. All datasets, models, and
code will be released publicly.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个Agentic人工智能（AAI）框架，旨在解决电动汽车物联网（IoEV）在网络安全、电池状态预测和可解释决策方面的挑战。
AI.motivation: 电动汽车物联网（IoEV）面临网络攻击、电池状态预测不可靠以及决策过程不透明等问题，这些因素损害了系统信任和性能。
AI.method: 设计了一个AAI架构，包括网络威胁检测与响应、实时SoC估计、SoH异常检测等专用代理，通过可解释的推理层协调；开发了可解释的威胁缓解机制；提出了韧性SoC和SoH模型，利用持续和对抗感知学习；并实现了一个三代理管道，利用大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的推理和动态工具调用来提供用户协助。
AI.result: 通过在多样化IoEV场景中的综合实验验证，该框架在安全性、预测准确性方面取得了显著改进。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的AAI框架有效提升了IoEV的安全性、电池状态预测的准确性和决策过程的可解释性，所有数据集、模型和代码将公开发布。

title: GraphDerm: Fusing Imaging, Physical Scale, and Metadata in a Population-Graph Classifier for Dermoscopic Lesions
summary:
Introduction. Dermoscopy aids melanoma triage, yet image-only AI often
ignores patient metadata (age, sex, site) and the physical scale needed for
geometric analysis. We present GraphDerm, a population-graph framework that
fuses imaging, millimeter-scale calibration, and metadata for multiclass
dermoscopic classification, to the best of our knowledge the first ISIC-scale
application of GNNs to dermoscopy. Methods. We curate ISIC 2018/2019,
synthesize ruler-embedded images with exact masks, and train U-Nets
(SE-ResNet-18) for lesion and ruler segmentation. Pixels-per-millimeter are
regressed from the ruler-mask two-point correlation via a lightweight 1D-CNN.
From lesion masks we compute real-scale descriptors (area, perimeter, radius of
gyration). Node features use EfficientNet-B3; edges encode metadata/geometry
similarity (fully weighted or thresholded). A spectral GNN performs
semi-supervised node classification; an image-only ANN is the baseline.
Results. Ruler and lesion segmentation reach Dice 0.904 and 0.908; scale
regression attains MAE 1.5 px (RMSE 6.6). The graph attains AUC 0.9812, with a
thresholded variant using about 25% of edges preserving AUC 0.9788 (vs. 0.9440
for the image-only baseline); per-class AUCs typically fall in the 0.97-0.99
range. Conclusion. Unifying calibrated scale, lesion geometry, and metadata in
a population graph yields substantial gains over image-only pipelines on
ISIC-2019. Sparser graphs retain near-optimal accuracy, suggesting efficient
deployment. Scale-aware, graph-based AI is a promising direction for
dermoscopic decision support; future work will refine learned edge semantics
and evaluate on broader curated benchmarks.

AI.tldr: GraphDerm框架结合图像、物理尺寸校准和患者元数据，显著提升了皮肤镜多类别分类的准确性，超越了纯图像AI，并首次在ISIC数据集上应用GNN。
AI.motivation: 现有的皮肤镜图像AI常忽略患者元数据（如年龄、性别、部位）和物理尺寸信息，而这些对病变几何分析和决策支持至关重要。
AI.method: 1. 整理ISIC 2018/2019数据集，并合成带刻度尺的图像。2. 训练U-Net（SE-ResNet-18）进行病变和刻度尺分割。3. 通过1D-CNN从刻度尺掩膜回归每毫米像素值。4. 从病变掩膜计算真实尺度的几何描述符。5. 节点特征使用EfficientNet-B3，边编码元数据/几何相似性。6. 采用谱GNN进行半监督节点分类，并与纯图像ANN基线进行比较。
AI.result: 刻度尺和病变分割Dice系数分别达到0.904和0.908；尺度回归MAE为1.5像素。GraphDerm的AUC达到0.9812，即使使用约25%的边，AUC仍能保持0.9788，显著优于纯图像基线（AUC 0.9440）。各类别AUC普遍在0.97-0.99之间。
AI.conclusion: 将校准尺度、病变几何特征和元数据整合到群体图模型中，在ISIC-2019数据集上显著优于纯图像方法。稀疏图仍能保持接近最优的准确性，预示着高效部署潜力。这种尺度感知、基于图的AI为皮肤镜决策支持提供了有前景的方向。

title: Profiling LoRA/QLoRA Fine-Tuning Efficiency on Consumer GPUs: An RTX 4060 Case Study
comment:
8 pages, 3 figures, 2 tables. Primary category: cs.LG (Machine
  Learning); secondary: cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). LaTeX source with
  figures included
summary:
Fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) with parameter-efficient techniques
such as LoRA and QLoRA has enabled adaptation of foundation models on modest
hardware. Yet the efficiency of such training on consumer-grade GPUs,
especially under strict 8 GB VRAM limits, remains underexplored. We present a
controlled profiling study of LoRA/QLoRA fine-tuning using the
Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct model on a single NVIDIA RTX 4060. Across three
representative configurations, we systematically vary batch size, sequence
length, optimizer choice (AdamW vs. PagedAdamW), and precision (fp16 vs. bf16).
We report throughput (tokens/s), time per 10k tokens, and VRAM footprint,
alongside energy estimates derived from GPU board power limits. Our results
show that paged optimizers improve throughput by up to 25% (628 tok/s vs. 500
tok/s baseline), while bf16 degrades efficiency relative to fp16. Despite 8 GB
constraints, sequence lengths up to 2048 tokens were feasible using
parameter-efficient strategies. To our knowledge, this is the first systematic
case study of LLM fine-tuning efficiency on consumer GPUs, providing
reproducible benchmarks and practical guidelines for resource-constrained
researchers and practitioners.

AI.tldr: 本研究系统评估了在8GB消费级GPU上使用LoRA/QLoRA微调大型语言模型的效率，发现分页优化器可提高吞吐量达25%，并证实即使在资源有限的情况下也能处理长序列。
AI.motivation: 尽管LoRA/QLoRA等参数高效技术使LLM在适度硬件上进行微调成为可能，但其在消费级GPU（特别是8GB显存限制下）的训练效率尚未得到充分探索。
AI.method: 使用Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct模型和单张NVIDIA RTX 4060 GPU，对LoRA/QLoRA微调进行受控剖析研究。系统性地改变批次大小、序列长度、优化器（AdamW vs PagedAdamW）和精度（fp16 vs bf16），报告吞吐量、每10k令牌时间、显存占用和能源估算。
AI.result: 分页优化器可将吞吐量提高25%（从基线的500 tok/s到628 tok/s），而bf16相较于fp16会降低效率。尽管有8GB显存限制，使用参数高效策略仍可支持长达2048令牌的序列长度。
AI.conclusion: 这是首个系统性地研究LLM在消费级GPU上微调效率的案例研究，为资源受限的研究人员和实践者提供了可复现的基准和实用指导。

title: Building Coding Agents via Entropy-Enhanced Multi-Turn Preference Optimization
summary:
Software engineering presents complex, multi-step challenges for Large
Language Models (LLMs), requiring reasoning over large codebases and
coordinated tool use. The difficulty of these tasks is exemplified by
benchmarks like SWE-bench, where current LLMs still struggle to resolve
real-world issues.
  A promising approach to enhance performance is test-time scaling (TTS), but
its gains are heavily dependent on the diversity of model outputs.
  While standard alignment methods such as Direct Preference Optimization (DPO)
and Kahneman-Tversky Optimization (KTO) are effective at aligning model outputs
with human preferences, this process can come at the cost of reduced diversity,
limiting the effectiveness of TTS.
  Additionally, existing preference optimization algorithms are typically
designed for single-turn tasks and do not fully address the complexities of
multi-turn reasoning and tool integration required for interactive coding
agents.
  To bridge this gap, we introduce \sys, an entropy-enhanced framework that
adapts existing preference optimization algorithms to the multi-turn,
tool-assisted setting.
  \sys augments the preference objective to explicitly preserve policy entropy
and generalizes learning to optimize over multi-turn interactions rather than
single-turn responses.
  We validate \sys by fine-tuning a diverse suite of models from different
families and sizes (up to 106B parameters).
  To maximize performance gains from TTS, we further propose a hybrid
best-trajectory selection scheme combining a learned verifier model with model
free approaches.
  On the \swebench leaderboard, our approach establishes new state-of-the-art
results among open-weight models. A 30B parameter model trained with \sys ranks
1st on \lite and 4th on \verified on the open-weight leaderboard, surpassed
only by models with over 10x more parameters(\eg$>$350B).

AI.tldr: 本文提出`\sys`框架，通过增强熵的多轮偏好优化，解决了LLM在软件工程多步任务中因传统对齐方法降低输出多样性及不适用于多轮交互的挑战，并在SWE-bench上取得了开源模型的最先进成果。
AI.motivation: LLM在软件工程（如SWE-bench）中面临复杂、多步挑战，需要对大型代码库进行推理并协调工具使用，而当前LLM表现不佳。尽管测试时缩放（TTS）可提升性能，但其效果受模型输出多样性影响。现有的偏好优化算法（如DPO、KTO）在提升偏好对齐的同时会降低多样性，且多为单轮任务设计，不适用于交互式编码代理所需的多轮推理和工具集成。
AI.method: 本文引入`\sys`框架，一个熵增强的框架，旨在将现有偏好优化算法适应于多轮、工具辅助的设置。`\sys`通过明确保留策略熵来增强偏好目标，并泛化学习以优化多轮交互而非单轮响应。为最大化TTS的性能收益，还提出了一种结合学习验证器模型和无模型方法的混合最佳轨迹选择方案。通过微调不同系列和大小（高达106B参数）的模型套件来验证此方法。
AI.result: 在SWE-bench排行榜上，`\sys`方法在开源模型中创造了新的最先进结果。一个使用`\sys`训练的30B参数模型在`\lite`上排名第1，在`\verified`上排名第4，仅被参数量大10倍以上（例如>350B）的模型超越。
AI.conclusion: `\sys`框架成功克服了LLM在软件工程多步任务中的挑战，通过在多轮、工具辅助环境下保留模型输出多样性并优化偏好，显著提升了LLM的性能，并在SWE-bench等基准测试中达到了开源模型的顶尖水平。

title: MAGIC-Enhanced Keyword Prompting for Zero-Shot Audio Captioning with CLIP Models
comment:
Accepted in The 26th International Conference on Web Information
  Systems Engineering (WISE), scheduled for 15-17 December 2025 in Marrakech,
  Morocco
summary:
Automated Audio Captioning (AAC) generates captions for audio clips but faces
challenges due to limited datasets compared to image captioning. To overcome
this, we propose the zero-shot AAC system that leverages pre-trained models,
eliminating the need for extensive training. Our approach uses a pre-trained
audio CLIP model to extract auditory features and generate a structured prompt,
which guides a Large Language Model (LLM) in caption generation. Unlike
traditional greedy decoding, our method refines token selection through the
audio CLIP model, ensuring alignment with the audio content. Experimental
results demonstrate a 35% improvement in NLG mean score (from 4.7 to 7.3) using
MAGIC search with the WavCaps model. The performance is heavily influenced by
the audio-text matching model and keyword selection, with optimal results
achieved using a single keyword prompt, and a 50% performance drop when no
keyword list is used.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种零样本自动音频字幕 (AAC) 系统，通过利用预训练的音频CLIP模型和大型语言模型 (LLM) 生成字幕，无需大量训练，并在NLG评分上取得了显著提升。
AI.motivation: 自动音频字幕 (AAC) 面临数据集有限的挑战，无法像图像字幕那样进行大量训练。
AI.method: 该方法使用预训练的音频CLIP模型提取音频特征并生成结构化提示，然后引导LLM生成字幕。通过音频CLIP模型优化token选择，确保与音频内容一致，而非传统的贪婪解码。
AI.result: 实验结果显示，使用WavCaps模型和MAGIC搜索，NLG平均得分提升了35%（从4.7到7.3）。性能受音频-文本匹配模型和关键词选择影响显著，使用单个关键词提示效果最佳，无关键词列表时性能下降50%。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的零样本AAC系统通过预训练模型有效解决了数据限制问题，其性能高度依赖于音频-文本匹配模型和关键词选择策略。

title: Secure and Efficient Out-of-band Call Metadata Transmission
summary:
The STIR/SHAKEN (S/S) attestation Framework mandated by the United States,
Canada, and France to combat pervasive telephone abuse has not achieved its
goals, partly because legacy non-VoIP infrastructure could not participate. The
industry solution to extend S/S broadcasts sensitive metadata of every non-VoIP
call in plaintext to every third party required to facilitate the system. It
has no mechanism to determine whether a provider's request for call data is
appropriate, nor can it ensure that every copy of that call data is unavailable
after its specified expiration. It threatens subscriber privacy and provider
confidentiality.
  In this paper, we present Sidecar, a distributed, privacy-preserving system
with tunable decentralization that securely extends S/S across all telephone
network technologies. We introduce the notion of secure out-of-band signaling
for telephony and formalize its system and security requirements. We then
design novel, scalable protocols that realize these requirements and prove
their security within the Universal Composability framework. Finally, we
demonstrate Sidecar's efficiency with our open-sourced reference
implementation. Compared to the current solution, Sidecar 1) protects the
confidentiality of subscriber identity and provider trade secrets, 2)
guarantees record expiration as long as a single node handling a record is
honest, 3) reduces resource requirements while providing virtually identical
call-setup times and equivalent or better uptimes, and 4) enables secure
pay-per-use billing and integrates mechanisms to mitigate and detect
misbehavior. Moreover, Sidecar can be extended to provide the same security
guarantees for arbitrary call metadata. Not only is Sidecar a superior
approach, it is also a transformative tool to retrofit fragmented global
telephony and enable future improvements, such as stronger call authentication
and Branded Calling.

AI.tldr: 现有STIR/SHAKEN框架因无法支持非VoIP遗留系统而未能有效打击电话滥用，其行业扩展方案存在严重隐私泄露风险。本文提出Sidecar，一个分布式、保护隐私的系统，可安全地将STIR/SHAKEN扩展至所有电话网络技术，解决了现有方案的隐私和安全问题。
AI.motivation: 美国、加拿大和法国强制实施的STIR/SHAKEN (S/S) 认证框架未能实现其打击普遍存在的电话滥用的目标，部分原因在于遗留的非VoIP基础设施无法参与。当前的行业解决方案在扩展S/S时，以明文形式向所有第三方广播每通非VoIP电话的敏感元数据，缺乏对数据请求的适当性判断机制和数据过期保证，严重威胁用户隐私和提供商机密性。
AI.method: 本文提出了Sidecar，一个具有可调去中心化特性的分布式隐私保护系统，用于安全地将S/S扩展到所有电话网络技术。研究引入了电话安全带外信令的概念，并形式化了其系统和安全要求。随后，设计了新颖、可扩展的协议来实现这些要求，并在通用可组合性框架内证明了其安全性。最后，通过开源的参考实现展示了Sidecar的效率。
AI.result: 与现有解决方案相比，Sidecar：1) 保护用户身份和提供商商业秘密的机密性；2) 只要处理记录的单个节点是诚实的，就能保证记录过期；3) 减少资源需求，同时提供几乎相同的呼叫建立时间和等同或更好的运行时间；4) 实现安全的按使用付费计费并集成了减轻和检测不当行为的机制。此外，Sidecar还可以扩展为任意呼叫元数据提供相同的安全保证。
AI.conclusion: Sidecar不仅是一种更优越的解决方案，它还是一个变革性工具，可以改造碎片化的全球电话系统，并促进未来改进，例如更强的呼叫认证和品牌呼叫。

title: PATIMT-Bench: A Multi-Scenario Benchmark for Position-Aware Text Image Machine Translation in Large Vision-Language Models
summary:
Text Image Machine Translation (TIMT) aims to translate texts embedded within
an image into another language. Current TIMT studies primarily focus on
providing translations for all the text within an image, while neglecting to
provide bounding boxes and covering limited scenarios. In this work, we extend
traditional TIMT into position-aware TIMT (PATIMT), aiming to support
fine-grained and layoutpreserving translation, which holds great practical
value but remains largely unexplored. This task comprises two key sub-tasks:
regionspecific translation and full-image translation with grounding. To
support existing models on PATIMT and conduct fair evaluation, we construct the
PATIMT benchmark (PATIMTBench), which consists of 10 diverse real-world
scenarios. Specifically, we introduce an Adaptive Image OCR Refinement
Pipeline, which adaptively selects appropriate OCR tools based on scenario and
refines the results of text-rich images. To ensure evaluation reliability, we
further construct a test set, which contains 1,200 high-quality instances
manually annotated and reviewed by human experts. After fine-tuning on our
data, compact Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) achieve state-of-the-art
performance on both sub-tasks. Experimental results also highlight the
scalability and generalizability of our training data

AI.tldr: 本文将文本图像机器翻译 (TIMT) 扩展为位置感知 TIMT (PATIMT)，以实现细粒度、保持布局的翻译。为此，构建了PATIMTBench基准数据集，提出了自适应OCR优化流程，并通过微调紧凑型大型视觉语言模型 (LVLMs) 实现了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有TIMT研究主要关注图像内所有文本的翻译，忽略提供边界框，并且应用场景有限。市场迫切需要支持细粒度、保持布局的文本图像翻译，这具有巨大的实用价值但尚未得到充分探索。
AI.method: 本文提出了位置感知TIMT (PATIMT) 任务，包含区域特定翻译和带接地的全图像翻译两个子任务。构建了包含10种真实世界场景的PATIMTBench基准，并引入了自适应图像OCR优化流程。此外，构建了一个包含1,200个高质量人工标注实例的测试集。通过在自建数据上微调紧凑型大型视觉语言模型 (LVLMs)。
AI.result: 经过微调后，紧凑型大型视觉语言模型 (LVLMs) 在PATIMT的两个子任务上均取得了最先进的性能。实验结果还强调了所构建训练数据的可扩展性和泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: PATIMT通过细粒度、保持布局的翻译，显著扩展了传统TIMT的实用性。PATIMTBench基准和自适应OCR优化流程为该任务提供了有效的支持和评估工具，并证明了LVLMs在该任务上的强大潜力及数据集的质量。

title: Flexible Multimodal Neuroimaging Fusion for Alzheimer's Disease Progression Prediction
comment: Accepted at Applications of Medical AI 2025
summary:
Alzheimer's disease (AD) is a progressive neurodegenerative disease with high
inter-patient variance in rate of cognitive decline. AD progression prediction
aims to forecast patient cognitive decline and benefits from incorporating
multiple neuroimaging modalities. However, existing multimodal models fail to
make accurate predictions when many modalities are missing during inference, as
is often the case in clinical settings. To increase multimodal model
flexibility under high modality missingness, we introduce PerM-MoE, a novel
sparse mixture-of-experts method that uses independent routers for each
modality in place of the conventional, single router. Using T1-weighted MRI,
FLAIR, amyloid beta PET, and tau PET neuroimaging data from the Alzheimer's
Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI), we evaluate PerM-MoE, state-of-the-art
Flex-MoE, and unimodal neuroimaging models on predicting two-year change in
Clinical Dementia Rating-Sum of Boxes (CDR-SB) scores under varying levels of
modality missingness. PerM-MoE outperforms the state of the art in most
variations of modality missingness and demonstrates more effective utility of
experts than Flex-MoE.

AI.tldr: 为解决阿尔茨海默病(AD)进展预测中多模态数据缺失问题，本文提出PerM-MoE模型，通过为每个模态配备独立路由器，提高了模型在高模态缺失情况下的预测准确性和灵活性，优于现有SOTA方法。
AI.motivation: 阿尔茨海默病(AD)患者认知衰退速度差异大，现有预测AD进展的多模态模型在临床实践中，当许多模态数据缺失时，预测准确性会大幅下降。
AI.method: 本文引入PerM-MoE，一种新颖的稀疏专家混合(mixture-of-experts)方法。该方法为每个模态使用独立的路由器，而非传统的单一路由器，以提高在高模态缺失情况下的多模态模型灵活性。利用来自ADNI的T1加权MRI、FLAIR、淀粉样蛋白PET和tau PET神经影像数据，预测CDR-SB分数两年变化。
AI.result: PerM-MoE在大多数模态缺失情况下均优于现有最先进的Flex-MoE模型和单模态神经影像模型，并展现出比Flex-MoE更有效的专家利用能力。
AI.conclusion: PerM-MoE为AD进展预测提供了一种更灵活和鲁棒的多模态模型，特别适用于临床数据模态不完整的情况，有效解决了现有模型在模态缺失时的局限性。

title: Enhancing Physical Consistency in Lightweight World Models
summary:
A major challenge in deploying world models is the trade-off between size and
performance. Large world models can capture rich physical dynamics but require
massive computing resources, making them impractical for edge devices. Small
world models are easier to deploy but often struggle to learn accurate physics,
leading to poor predictions. We propose the Physics-Informed BEV World Model
(PIWM), a compact model designed to efficiently capture physical interactions
in bird's-eye-view (BEV) representations. PIWM uses Soft Mask during training
to improve dynamic object modeling and future prediction. We also introduce a
simple yet effective technique, Warm Start, for inference to enhance prediction
quality with a zero-shot model. Experiments show that at the same parameter
scale (400M), PIWM surpasses the baseline by 60.6% in weighted overall score.
Moreover, even when compared with the largest baseline model (400M), the
smallest PIWM (130M Soft Mask) achieves a 7.4% higher weighted overall score
with a 28% faster inference speed.

AI.tldr: 本文提出PIWM，一个紧凑型世界模型，通过Soft Mask和Warm Start技术，在大幅减少模型规模的同时，显著提升了BEV表示中的预测性能和推理速度，有效解决了世界模型在规模与性能间的权衡问题。
AI.motivation: 部署世界模型面临规模与性能的矛盾：大型模型性能优异但计算资源需求大，不适用于边缘设备；小型模型易于部署但物理预测能力差。因此，需要开发一种紧凑且能准确捕获物理动态的世界模型。
AI.method: 提出物理信息鸟瞰图世界模型（PIWM），一个紧凑型模型，旨在高效捕获BEV表示中的物理交互。PIWM在训练时使用Soft Mask技术以改进动态对象建模和未来预测。此外，引入Warm Start技术用于推理，以提升零样本模型的预测质量。
AI.result: 实验表明，在相同参数规模（400M）下，PIWM的加权总分比基线高出60.6%。更重要的是，即使与最大的基线模型（400M）相比，最小的PIWM（130M Soft Mask）也能实现7.4%更高的加权总分和28%更快的推理速度。
AI.conclusion: PIWM成功提供了一个高效且性能优越的世界模型解决方案，在保证紧凑模型规模的同时，显著提升了预测精度和推理速度，证明了其在解决世界模型部署挑战方面的有效性，尤其适用于资源受限的环境。

title: EconProver: Towards More Economical Test-Time Scaling for Automated Theorem Proving
summary:
Large Language Models (LLMs) have recently advanced the field of Automated
Theorem Proving (ATP), attaining substantial performance gains through widely
adopted test-time scaling strategies, notably reflective Chain-of-Thought (CoT)
reasoning and increased sampling passes. However, they both introduce
significant computational overhead for inference. Moreover, existing cost
analyses typically regulate only the number of sampling passes, while
neglecting the substantial disparities in sampling costs introduced by
different scaling strategies. In this paper, we systematically compare the
efficiency of different test-time scaling strategies for ATP models and
demonstrate the inefficiency of the current state-of-the-art (SOTA) open-source
approaches. We then investigate approaches to significantly reduce token usage
and sample passes while maintaining the original performance. Specifically, we
propose two complementary methods that can be integrated into a unified EconRL
pipeline for amplified benefits: (1) a dynamic Chain-of-Thought (CoT) switching
mechanism designed to mitigate unnecessary token consumption, and (2) Diverse
parallel-scaled reinforcement learning (RL) with trainable prefixes to enhance
pass rates under constrained sampling passes. Experiments on miniF2F and
ProofNet demonstrate that our EconProver achieves comparable performance to
baseline methods with only 12% of the computational cost. This work provides
actionable insights for deploying lightweight ATP models without sacrificing
performance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出EconProver，通过动态CoT切换和多样化并行RL来显著降低大型语言模型驱动的自动定理证明（ATP）的计算成本（仅为基线的12%），同时保持原始性能，以实现轻量级ATP模型部署。
AI.motivation: 当前LLM在ATP中使用的测试时扩展策略（如CoT推理和增加采样次数）虽提升了性能，但引入了显著的推理计算开销。现有成本分析忽略了不同扩展策略的采样成本差异，导致现有开源SOTA方法效率低下。因此，需要开发方法在保持性能的同时，大幅减少token使用和采样次数。
AI.method: 系统比较不同ATP测试时扩展策略的效率。提出两种互补方法并整合到统一的EconRL流程中：1) 动态CoT切换机制，以减少不必要的token消耗；2) 带有可训练前缀的多样化并行强化学习（RL），以在有限采样次数下提高通过率。
AI.result: 在miniF2F和ProofNet上的实验表明，EconProver实现了与基线方法相当的性能，但计算成本仅为基线的12%。
AI.conclusion: 本研究为在不牺牲性能的情况下部署轻量级ATP模型提供了可行的见解和方法。

title: CattleSense -- A Multisensory Approach to Optimize Cattle Well-Being
comment:
5 pages, 9 figures. Author's accepted manuscript of a paper published
  in the 2024 ASET Conference. The final version is available at:
  https://doi.org/10.1109/ASET60340.2024.10708764
summary:
CattleSense is an innovative application of Internet of Things (IoT)
technology for the comprehensive monitoring and management of cattle
well-being. This research paper outlines the design and implementation of a
sophisticated system using a Raspberry Pi Module 4B, RFID Card Reader, Electret
Arduino Microphone Module, DHT11 Sensor, Arduino UNO, Neo-6M GPS Sensor, and
Heartbeat Sensor. The system aims to provide real-time surveillance of the
environment in which Cows are present and individual Cow parameters such as
location, milking frequency, and heartbeat fluctuations. The primary objective
is to simplify managing the Cattle in the shed, ensuring that the Cattle are
healthy and safe.

AI.tldr: CattleSense是一个基于物联网的系统，旨在全面监测和管理牛只健康，确保其安全。
AI.motivation: 简化牛棚管理，确保牛只的健康和安全。
AI.method: 设计并实现了一个复杂的系统，使用树莓派Module 4B、RFID读卡器、麦克风模块、DHT11传感器、Arduino UNO、Neo-6M GPS传感器和心跳传感器。
AI.result: 系统能够实时监测牛只所处环境及个体参数，如位置、挤奶频率和心跳波动。
AI.conclusion: CattleSense系统通过实时监测，旨在简化牛只管理并保障其健康与安全。

title: Domain Adaptive SAR Wake Detection: Leveraging Similarity Filtering and Memory Guidance
summary:
Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR), with its all-weather and wide-area
observation capabilities, serves as a crucial tool for wake detection. However,
due to its complex imaging mechanism, wake features in SAR images often appear
abstract and noisy, posing challenges for accurate annotation. In contrast,
optical images provide more distinct visual cues, but models trained on optical
data suffer from performance degradation when applied to SAR images due to
domain shift. To address this cross-modal domain adaptation challenge, we
propose a Similarity-Guided and Memory-Guided Domain Adaptation (termed
SimMemDA) framework for unsupervised domain adaptive ship wake detection via
instance-level feature similarity filtering and feature memory guidance.
Specifically, to alleviate the visual discrepancy between optical and SAR
images, we first utilize WakeGAN to perform style transfer on optical images,
generating pseudo-images close to the SAR style. Then, instance-level feature
similarity filtering mechanism is designed to identify and prioritize source
samples with target-like distributions, minimizing negative transfer.
Meanwhile, a Feature-Confidence Memory Bank combined with a K-nearest neighbor
confidence-weighted fusion strategy is introduced to dynamically calibrate
pseudo-labels in the target domain, improving the reliability and stability of
pseudo-labels. Finally, the framework further enhances generalization through
region-mixed training, strategically combining source annotations with
calibrated target pseudo-labels. Experimental results demonstrate that the
proposed SimMemDA method can improve the accuracy and robustness of cross-modal
ship wake detection tasks, validating the effectiveness and feasibility of the
proposed method.

AI.tldr: 针对合成孔径雷达（SAR）船尾迹检测中跨模态域适应挑战，本文提出SimMemDA框架，通过风格迁移、实例级特征相似性过滤和记忆库引导的伪标签校准，有效提升了跨模态SAR船尾迹检测的准确性和鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: SAR图像中的船尾迹特征抽象且噪声大，难以准确标注；而光学图像模型因领域漂移在SAR图像上性能下降。因此，亟需解决跨模态域适应问题以提高SAR船尾迹检测能力。
AI.method: 提出SimMemDA框架。首先，利用WakeGAN将光学图像转换为SAR风格的伪图像。其次，设计实例级特征相似性过滤机制，优先选择与目标域分布相似的源样本。同时，引入特征置信度记忆库结合K-近邻置信度加权融合策略，动态校准目标域伪标签。最后，通过区域混合训练进一步增强泛化能力。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，所提出的SimMemDA方法能显著提高跨模态船尾迹检测任务的准确性和鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: SimMemDA方法在解决跨模态SAR船尾迹检测问题上是有效且可行的，显著提升了检测性能。

title: RL Fine-Tuning Heals OOD Forgetting in SFT
summary:
The two-stage fine-tuning paradigm of Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) followed
by Reinforcement Learning (RL) has empirically shown better reasoning
performance than one-stage SFT for the post-training of Large Language Models
(LLMs). However, the evolution and mechanism behind the synergy of SFT and RL
are still under-explored and inconclusive. In our study, we find the well-known
claim "SFT memorizes, RL generalizes" is over-simplified, and discover that:
(1) OOD performance peaks at the early stage of SFT and then declines (OOD
forgetting), the best SFT checkpoint cannot be captured by training/test loss;
(2) the subsequent RL stage does not generate fundamentally better OOD
capability, instead it plays an \textbf{OOD restoration} role, recovering the
lost reasoning ability during SFT; (3) The recovery ability has boundaries,
\ie{} \textbf{if SFT trains for too short or too long, RL cannot recover the
lost OOD ability;} (4) To uncover the underlying mechanisms behind the
forgetting and restoration process, we employ SVD analysis on parameter
matrices, manually edit them, and observe their impacts on model performance.
Unlike the common belief that the shift of model capacity mainly results from
the changes of singular values, we find that they are actually quite stable
throughout fine-tuning. Instead, the OOD behavior strongly correlates with the
\textbf{rotation of singular vectors}. Our findings re-identify the roles of
SFT and RL in the two-stage fine-tuning and discover the rotation of singular
vectors as the key mechanism. %reversing the rotations induced by SFT, which
shows recovery from forgetting, whereas imposing the SFT parameter directions
onto a RL-tuned model results in performance degradation. Code is available at
https://github.com/xiaodanguoguo/RL_Heals_SFT

AI.tldr: 研究发现，两阶段微调中SFT会导致OOD性能遗忘，而RL通过“OOD恢复”来弥补，且这种恢复能力有边界。核心机制是参数矩阵中奇异向量的旋转，而非奇异值的变化。
AI.motivation: LLM两阶段微调（SFT后接RL）在推理性能上优于单阶段SFT，但其协同作用的演变和机制尚不明确，且“SFT记忆，RL泛化”的说法过于简化，因此需要深入探索。
AI.method: 通过实证研究观察SFT和RL阶段的OOD性能表现；对参数矩阵进行SVD分析；手动编辑参数矩阵并观察其对模型性能的影响。
AI.result: (1) SFT早期OOD性能达到峰值后下降（OOD遗忘），最佳SFT检查点无法通过训练/测试损失捕获；(2) RL阶段不产生根本性的OOD能力提升，而是恢复SFT过程中丢失的推理能力，起到“OOD恢复”作用；(3) 恢复能力有边界，SFT训练过短或过长都会导致RL无法恢复OOD能力；(4) 奇异值在微调过程中保持稳定，OOD行为与奇异向量的旋转强相关。
AI.conclusion: 重新定义了SFT和RL在两阶段微调中的角色：SFT可能导致OOD遗忘，RL则负责恢复。发现奇异向量的旋转是OOD遗忘和恢复过程中的关键机制。

title: Reasoning Models Can be Accurately Pruned Via Chain-of-Thought Reconstruction
summary:
Reasoning language models such as DeepSeek-R1 produce long chain-of-thought
traces during inference time which make them costly to deploy at scale. We show
that using compression techniques such as neural network pruning produces
greater performance loss than in typical language modeling tasks, and in some
cases can make the model slower since they cause the model to produce more
thinking tokens but with worse performance. We show that this is partly due to
the fact that standard LLM pruning methods often focus on input reconstruction,
whereas reasoning is a decode-dominated task. We introduce a simple, drop-in
fix: during pruning we jointly reconstruct activations from the input and the
model's on-policy chain-of-thought traces. This "Reasoning-Aware Compression"
(RAC) integrates seamlessly into existing pruning workflows such as SparseGPT,
and boosts their performance significantly. Code reproducing the results in the
paper can be found at: https://github.com/RyanLucas3/RAC

AI.tldr: 推理语言模型因长CoT轨迹部署成本高。现有剪枝方法对此类任务效果差且性能损失大，因其主要关注输入重构而非解码。本文提出“推理感知压缩”（RAC），通过联合重构输入和CoT激活，显著提升了剪枝性能。
AI.motivation: 解决推理语言模型（如DeepSeek-R1）在推理时生成冗长思维链（CoT）轨迹，导致大规模部署成本高昂的问题。同时指出现有压缩技术（如神经网络剪枝）对推理任务的性能损失比一般语言建模任务更大，且可能适得其反，使模型更慢。
AI.method: 提出“推理感知压缩”（Reasoning-Aware Compression, RAC）方法。该方法在剪枝过程中，同时重构来自输入和模型“在策略”思维链轨迹的激活，解决了标准LLM剪枝方法只关注输入重构而推理是解码主导任务的问题。RAC可无缝集成到现有剪枝工作流（如SparseGPT）。
AI.result: 实验表明，标准LLM剪枝方法在推理任务上会造成显著的性能下降，甚至可能导致模型变慢。而RAC方法能显著提升现有剪枝工作流（如SparseGPT）的性能。
AI.conclusion: 通过在剪枝时联合重构输入和模型推理过程中的思维链轨迹激活，可以有效解决推理语言模型压缩面临的挑战，显著提高其性能，从而降低其部署成本。

title: Positional Encoding via Token-Aware Phase Attention
summary:
We prove under practical assumptions that Rotary Positional Embedding (RoPE)
introduces an intrinsic distance-dependent bias in attention scores that limits
RoPE's ability to model long-context. RoPE extension methods may alleviate this
issue, but they typically require post-hoc adjustments after pretraining, such
as rescaling or hyperparameters retuning. This paper introduces Token-Aware
Phase Attention (TAPA), a new positional encoding method that incorporates a
learnable phase function into the attention mechanism. TAPA preserves token
interactions over long range, extends to longer contexts with direct and light
fine-tuning, extrapolates to unseen lengths, and attains significantly lower
perplexity on long-context than RoPE families.

AI.tldr: Rotary Positional Embedding (RoPE)在长上下文建模中存在内在的距离依赖偏差。本文提出Token-Aware Phase Attention (TAPA)，通过引入可学习的相位函数，显著优于RoPE及其变体，能更好地处理长上下文和未见长度。
AI.motivation: RoPE存在固有的距离依赖偏差，限制其长上下文建模能力。现有的RoPE扩展方法通常需要预训练后的额外调整，如重新缩放或超参数调优，缺乏直接和轻量级的长上下文扩展方案。
AI.method: 引入Token-Aware Phase Attention (TAPA)作为一种新的位置编码方法。TAPA将一个可学习的相位函数整合到注意力机制中。
AI.result: TAPA在长距离上能保留token间的交互，通过直接和轻量级的微调可扩展到更长的上下文，并能外推到未见的长度。在长上下文上，TAPA比RoPE家族取得了显著更低的困惑度。
AI.conclusion: TAPA作为一种新的位置编码方法，有效解决了RoPE在长上下文建模中的局限性，提供了一种更优异、更具扩展性的长上下文处理方案。

title: Uncertainty-Aware Hourly Air Temperature Mapping at 2 km Resolution via Physics-Guided Deep Learning
summary:
Near-surface air temperature is a key physical property of the Earth's
surface. Although weather stations offer continuous monitoring and satellites
provide broad spatial coverage, no single data source offers seamless data in a
spatiotemporal fashion. Here, we propose a data-driven, physics-guided deep
learning approach to generate hourly air temperature data at 2 km resolution
over the contiguous United States. The approach, called Amplifier
Air-Transformer, first reconstructs GOES-16 surface temperature data obscured
by clouds. It does so through a neural network encoded with the annual
temperature cycle, incorporating a linear term to amplify ERA5 temperature
values at finer scales and convolutional layers to capture spatiotemporal
variations. Then, another neural network transforms the reconstructed surface
temperature into air temperature by leveraging its latent relationship with key
Earth surface properties. The approach is further enhanced with predictive
uncertainty estimation through deep ensemble learning to improve reliability.
The proposed approach is built and tested on 77.7 billion surface temperature
pixels and 155 million air temperature records from weather stations across the
contiguous United States (2018-2024), achieving hourly air temperature mapping
accuracy of 1.93 C in station-based validation. The proposed approach
streamlines surface temperature reconstruction and air temperature prediction,
and it can be extended to other satellite sources for seamless air temperature
monitoring at high spatiotemporal resolution. The generated data of this study
can be downloaded at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15252812, and the project
webpage can be found at https://skrisliu.com/HourlyAirTemp2kmUSA/.

AI.tldr: 提出一种名为Amplifier Air-Transformer的数据驱动、物理指导的深度学习方法，用于生成美国本土2公里分辨率的逐小时近地表气温数据，通过重建卫星地表温度并转换为气温，实现了1.93°C的精度。
AI.motivation: 近地表气温是地球表面的关键物理属性，但现有数据源（气象站和卫星）无法提供无缝的高时空分辨率数据。
AI.method: 该方法分两步：1. 利用一个编码了年度温度周期、结合ERA5数据放大及卷积层的神经网络，重建被云遮蔽的GOES-16地表温度数据。2. 另一个神经网络利用重建的地表温度与关键地球表面属性的潜在关系，将其转换为气温。通过深度集成学习增强了预测不确定性估计。模型基于2018-2024年美国本土的777亿地表温度像素和1.55亿气象站气温记录进行构建和测试。
AI.result: 在基于气象站的验证中，实现了1.93°C的逐小时气温绘图精度。
AI.conclusion: 该方法简化了地表温度重建和气温预测过程，未来可推广到其他卫星源，以实现高时空分辨率的无缝气温监测。研究生成的数据已可供下载。

title: Neural Diffeomorphic-Neural Operator for Residual Stress-Induced Deformation Prediction
summary:
Accurate prediction of machining deformation in structural components is
essential for ensuring dimensional precision and reliability. Such deformation
often originates from residual stress fields, whose distribution and influence
vary significantly with geometric complexity. Conventional numerical methods
for modeling the coupling between residual stresses and deformation are
computationally expensive, particularly when diverse geometries are considered.
Neural operators have recently emerged as a powerful paradigm for efficiently
solving partial differential equations, offering notable advantages in
accelerating residual stress-deformation analysis. However, their direct
application across changing geometric domains faces theoretical and practical
limitations. To address this challenge, a novel framework based on
diffeomorphic embedding neural operators named neural diffeomorphic-neural
operator (NDNO) is introduced. Complex three-dimensional geometries are
explicitly mapped to a common reference domain through a diffeomorphic neural
network constrained by smoothness and invertibility. The neural operator is
then trained on this reference domain, enabling efficient learning of
deformation fields induced by residual stresses. Once trained, both the
diffeomorphic neural network and the neural operator demonstrate efficient
prediction capabilities, allowing rapid adaptation to varying geometries. The
proposed method thus provides an effective and computationally efficient
solution for deformation prediction in structural components subject to varying
geometries. The proposed method is validated to predict both main-direction and
multi-direction deformation fields, achieving high accuracy and efficiency
across parts with diverse geometries including component types, dimensions and
features.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种名为神经微分同胚-神经算子（NDNO）的新框架，通过将复杂几何映射到公共参考域来训练神经算子，以高效、准确地预测不同几何形状结构件的加工变形。
AI.motivation: 准确预测结构件加工变形至关重要，但传统数值方法处理复杂或多变几何形状时计算成本高昂。现有神经算子难以直接应用于变化的几何域以解决残余应力引起的变形预测问题。
AI.method: 引入神经微分同胚-神经算子（NDNO）框架。该方法通过微分同胚神经网络将复杂三维几何体映射到一个公共参考域，并在此参考域上训练神经算子，从而学习残余应力引起的变形场。
AI.result: 经验证，NDNO方法能够高精度、高效率地预测主方向和多方向变形场，并能有效适应不同类型、尺寸和特征的多种几何形状组件。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的NDNO方法为在不同几何形状下预测结构件变形提供了一种有效且计算高效的解决方案，克服了传统方法和现有神经算子的局限性。

title: Empowering Clinical Trial Design through AI: A Randomized Evaluation of PowerGPT
summary:
Sample size calculations for power analysis are critical for clinical
research and trial design, yet their complexity and reliance on statistical
expertise create barriers for many researchers. We introduce PowerGPT, an
AI-powered system integrating large language models (LLMs) with statistical
engines to automate test selection and sample size estimation in trial design.
In a randomized trial to evaluate its effectiveness, PowerGPT significantly
improved task completion rates (99.3% vs. 88.9% for test selection, 99.3% vs.
77.8% for sample size calculation) and accuracy (94.1% vs. 55.4% in sample size
estimation, p < 0.001), while reducing average completion time (4.0 vs. 9.3
minutes, p < 0.001). These gains were consistent across various statistical
tests and benefited both statisticians and non-statisticians as well as
bridging expertise gaps. Already under deployment across multiple institutions,
PowerGPT represents a scalable AI-driven approach that enhances accessibility,
efficiency, and accuracy in statistical power analysis for clinical research.

AI.tldr: PowerGPT是一款结合LLM与统计引擎的AI系统，能自动化临床研究中的统计检验选择和样本量估算，显著提高完成率、准确性并缩短时间。
AI.motivation: 临床研究和试验设计中，功效分析的样本量计算因其复杂性和对统计专业知识的依赖，对许多研究人员造成障碍。
AI.method: 引入PowerGPT系统，该系统整合大型语言模型（LLMs）和统计引擎，以自动化试验设计中的统计检验选择和样本量估算。通过随机试验评估其有效性。
AI.result: PowerGPT显著提高了任务完成率（检验选择99.3% vs 88.9%；样本量计算99.3% vs 77.8%）和准确性（样本量估算94.1% vs 55.4%，p < 0.001），同时缩短了平均完成时间（4.0 vs 9.3分钟，p < 0.001）。这些改进对统计学家和非统计学家均有效。
AI.conclusion: PowerGPT代表了一种可扩展的AI驱动方法，增强了临床研究中统计功效分析的可及性、效率和准确性，并已在多机构部署。

title: PAC: Pronunciation-Aware Contextualized Large Language Model-based Automatic Speech Recognition
summary:
This paper presents a Pronunciation-Aware Contextualized (PAC) framework to
address two key challenges in Large Language Model (LLM)-based Automatic Speech
Recognition (ASR) systems: effective pronunciation modeling and robust
homophone discrimination. Both are essential for raw or long-tail word
recognition. The proposed approach adopts a two-stage learning paradigm. First,
we introduce a pronunciation-guided context learning method. It employs an
interleaved grapheme-phoneme context modeling strategy that incorporates
grapheme-only distractors, encouraging the model to leverage phonemic cues for
accurate recognition. Then, we propose a pronunciation-discriminative
reinforcement learning method with perturbed label sampling to further enhance
the model\'s ability to distinguish contextualized homophones. Experimental
results on the public English Librispeech and Mandarin AISHELL-1 datasets
indicate that PAC: (1) reduces relative Word Error Rate (WER) by 30.2% and
53.8% compared to pre-trained LLM-based ASR models, and (2) achieves 31.8% and
60.5% relative reductions in biased WER for long-tail words compared to strong
baselines, respectively.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个发音感知上下文（PAC）框架，通过两阶段学习范式，显著提升了LLM-ASR系统的发音建模和同音异形词辨别能力，尤其对生词和长尾词的识别效果优异。
AI.motivation: 解决基于大型语言模型（LLM）的自动语音识别（ASR）系统中的两大核心挑战：有效的发音建模和鲁棒的同音异形词辨别，这两点对于识别生词或长尾词至关重要。
AI.method: 该方法采用两阶段学习范式：首先，引入发音引导的上下文学习方法，利用交错的字素-音素上下文建模策略，并结合纯字素干扰器，以鼓励模型利用音素线索。其次，提出发音区分强化学习方法，通过扰动标签采样进一步增强模型区分上下文同音异形词的能力。
AI.result: 在公开的英语Librispeech和普通话AISHELL-1数据集上，PAC框架与预训练的LLM-ASR模型相比，相对词错误率（WER）分别降低了30.2%和53.8%。与强基线模型相比，对于长尾词的偏置WER分别相对降低了31.8%和60.5%。
AI.conclusion: PAC框架通过其创新的发音建模和同音异形词区分策略，显著提升了LLM-ASR系统的性能，尤其在处理一般词汇和长尾词的识别方面表现出卓越的效果。

title: DS@GT AnimalCLEF: Triplet Learning over ViT Manifolds with Nearest Neighbor Classification for Animal Re-identification
summary:
This paper details the DS@GT team's entry for the AnimalCLEF 2025
re-identification challenge. Our key finding is that the effectiveness of
post-hoc metric learning is highly contingent on the initial quality and
domain-specificity of the backbone embeddings. We compare a general-purpose
model (DINOv2) with a domain-specific model (MegaDescriptor) as a backbone. A
K-Nearest Neighbor classifier with robust thresholding then identifies known
individuals or flags new ones. While a triplet-learning projection head
improved the performance of the specialized MegaDescriptor model by 0.13
points, it yielded minimal gains (0.03) for the general-purpose DINOv2 on
averaged BAKS and BAUS. We demonstrate that the general-purpose manifold is
more difficult to reshape for fine-grained tasks, as evidenced by stagnant
validation loss and qualitative visualizations. This work highlights the
critical limitations of refining general-purpose features for specialized,
limited-data re-ID tasks and underscores the importance of domain-specific
pre-training. The implementation for this work is publicly available at
github.com/dsgt-arc/animalclef-2025.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了AnimalCLEF 2025动物重识别挑战的参赛方案。研究发现，后处理度量学习的有效性高度依赖于骨干嵌入的初始质量和领域特异性。领域特定模型（MegaDescriptor）通过度量学习获得显著提升，而通用模型（DINOv2）获益甚微，强调了领域特定预训练的重要性。
AI.motivation: 参与AnimalCLEF 2025重识别挑战，并探究后处理度量学习在动物重识别任务中，其有效性如何受骨干网络嵌入质量和领域特异性的影响。
AI.method: 比较了通用模型DINOv2和领域特定模型MegaDescriptor作为骨干网络。使用K-Nearest Neighbor分类器结合鲁棒阈值进行个体识别。评估了三元组学习（triplet-learning）投影头对两种骨干网络性能的提升效果。
AI.result: 三元组学习使领域特定MegaDescriptor模型的性能提高了0.13点，但对通用DINOv2模型的提升微乎其微（0.03点）。通用特征流形难以重塑以适应细粒度任务，表现为验证损失停滞和可视化效果不佳。
AI.conclusion: 后处理度量学习的有效性关键取决于骨干嵌入的初始质量和领域特异性。为专业的、数据有限的重识别任务微调通用特征存在局限性，突显了领域特定预训练的重要性。

title: Interpretable Data Mining of Follicular Thyroid Cancer Ultrasound Features Using Enhanced Association Rules
summary:
Purpose: Thyroid cancer has been a common cancer. Papillary thyroid cancer
and follicular thyroid cancer are the two most common types of thyroid cancer.
Follicular thyroid cancer lacks distinctive ultrasound signs and is more
difficult to diagnose preoperatively than the more prevalent papillary thyroid
cancer, and the clinical studies associated with it are less well established.
We aimed to analyze the clinical data of follicular thyroid cancer based on a
novel data mining tool to identify some clinical indications that may help in
preoperative diagnosis. Methods: We performed a retrospective analysis based on
case data collected by the Department of General Surgery of Peking University
Third Hospital between 2010 and 2023. Unlike traditional statistical methods,
we improved the association rule mining, a classical data mining method, and
proposed new analytical metrics reflecting the malignant association between
clinical indications and cancer with the help of the idea of SHAP method in
interpretable machine learning. Results: The dataset was preprocessed to
contain 1673 cases (in terms of nodes rather than patients), of which 1414 were
benign and 259 were malignant nodes. Our analysis pointed out that in addition
to some common indicators (e.g., irregular or lobulated nodal margins, uneven
thickness halo, hypoechogenicity), there were also some indicators with strong
malignant associations, such as nodule-in-nodule pattern, trabecular pattern,
and low TSH scores. In addition, our results suggest that the combination of
Hashimoto's thyroiditis may also have a strong malignant association.
Conclusion: In the preoperative diagnosis of nodules suspected of follicular
thyroid cancer, multiple clinical indications should be considered for a more
accurate diagnosis. The diverse malignant associations identified in our study
may serve as a reference for clinicians in related fields.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用改进的数据挖掘工具分析了滤泡状甲状腺癌的临床数据，识别出多种与恶性病变强相关的临床指标，以辅助术前诊断。
AI.motivation: 滤泡状甲状腺癌缺乏独特的超声特征，术前诊断比乳头状甲状腺癌更困难，且相关临床研究较少。本研究旨在通过数据挖掘工具识别有助于术前诊断的临床指标。
AI.method: 对北京大学第三医院2010年至2023年收集的病例数据进行回顾性分析。改进了关联规则挖掘方法，并借鉴可解释机器学习中SHAP方法的思想，提出了反映临床指标与癌症恶性关联的新分析指标。
AI.result: 分析了1673个病例节点（1414个良性，259个恶性），发现除了常见的恶性指标（如结节边缘不规则/分叶、晕环厚度不均、低回声）外，结节内结节模式、小梁模式和低TSH评分也与恶性病变有强关联。此外，合并桥本甲状腺炎可能也与恶性病变有强关联。
AI.conclusion: 在滤泡状甲状腺癌疑似结节的术前诊断中，应综合考虑多种临床指标以提高诊断准确性。本研究识别出的不同恶性关联可为临床医生提供参考。

title: Physical Complexity of a Cognitive Artifact
summary:
Cognitive science and theoretical computer science both seek to classify and
explain the difficulty of tasks. Mechanisms of intelligence are those that
reduce task difficulty. Here we map concepts from the computational complexity
of a physical puzzle, the Soma Cube, onto cognitive problem-solving strategies
through a ``Principle of Materiality''. By analyzing the puzzle's branching
factor, measured through search tree outdegree, we quantitatively assess task
difficulty and systematically examine how different strategies modify
complexity. We incrementally refine a trial-and-error search by layering
preprocessing (cognitive chunking), value ordering (cognitive free-sorting),
variable ordering (cognitive scaffolding), and pruning (cognitive inference).
We discuss how the competent use of artifacts reduces effective time complexity
by exploiting physical constraints and propose a model of intelligence as a
library of algorithms that recruit the capabilities of both mind and matter.

AI.tldr: 本文通过分析Soma Cube物理谜题的计算复杂性，探讨认知策略（如分块、排序、剪枝）如何降低任务难度，并提出一种整合心智与物质能力的智能模型。
AI.motivation: 认知科学和理论计算机科学均旨在分类和解释任务难度。本研究旨在通过分析物理谜题的计算复杂性，理解智能机制如何降低任务难度，并将其映射到认知问题解决策略上。
AI.method: 通过“物质性原理”将Soma Cube的计算复杂性概念映射到认知策略。通过分析谜题的搜索树出度（分支因子）来定量评估任务难度，并系统性地考察不同策略如何修改复杂性。通过分层改进试错搜索，包括预处理（认知分块）、价值排序（认知自由分类）、变量排序（认知支架）和剪枝（认知推理）。
AI.result: 研究系统性地展示了不同认知策略如何有效修改任务复杂性。发现人工制品的恰当使用能够通过利用物理约束来降低有效时间复杂性。
AI.conclusion: 提出了一种智能模型，认为智能是一个利用心智和物质能力的算法库。

title: Don't Change My View: Ideological Bias Auditing in Large Language Models
summary:
As large language models (LLMs) become increasingly embedded in products used
by millions, their outputs may influence individual beliefs and, cumulatively,
shape public opinion. If the behavior of LLMs can be intentionally steered
toward specific ideological positions, such as political or religious views,
then those who control these systems could gain disproportionate influence over
public discourse. Although it remains an open question whether LLMs can
reliably be guided toward coherent ideological stances and whether such
steering can be effectively prevented, a crucial first step is to develop
methods for detecting when such steering attempts occur. In this work, we adapt
a previously proposed statistical method to the new context of ideological bias
auditing. Our approach carries over the model-agnostic design of the original
framework, which does not require access to the internals of the language
model. Instead, it identifies potential ideological steering by analyzing
distributional shifts in model outputs across prompts that are thematically
related to a chosen topic. This design makes the method particularly suitable
for auditing proprietary black-box systems. We validate our approach through a
series of experiments, demonstrating its practical applicability and its
potential to support independent post hoc audits of LLM behavior.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种模型无关的统计方法，通过分析主题相关提示下LLM输出的分布变化，来检测其是否存在意识形态偏见引导，适用于审计专有黑盒系统。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）日益嵌入产品，其输出可能影响个人信仰并塑造公众舆论。如果LLM行为可被刻意引导至特定意识形态立场，控制者将获得不对称影响力。因此，开发检测此类引导尝试的方法至关重要。
AI.method: 本文将一种已有的统计方法应用于意识形态偏见审计。该方法采用模型无关设计，无需访问LLM内部，而是通过分析模型在与特定主题相关的提示上的输出分布偏移来识别潜在的意识形态引导，特别适用于审计专有黑盒系统。
AI.result: 通过一系列实验验证了该方法的实用性，并展示了其支持LLM行为独立事后审计的潜力。
AI.conclusion: 所开发的方法为检测LLM中的意识形态引导提供了一个关键的初步步骤，尤其适用于黑盒系统，有助于实现独立的审计。

title: GhostNetV3-Small: A Tailored Architecture and Comparative Study of Distillation Strategies for Tiny Images
summary:
Deep neural networks have achieved remarkable success across a range of
tasks, however their computational demands often make them unsuitable for
deployment on resource-constrained edge devices. This paper explores strategies
for compressing and adapting models to enable efficient inference in such
environments. We focus on GhostNetV3, a state-of-the-art architecture for
mobile applications, and propose GhostNetV3-Small, a modified variant designed
to perform better on low-resolution inputs such as those in the CIFAR-10
dataset. In addition to architectural adaptation, we provide a comparative
evaluation of knowledge distillation techniques, including traditional
knowledge distillation, teacher assistants, and teacher ensembles. Experimental
results show that GhostNetV3-Small significantly outperforms the original
GhostNetV3 on CIFAR-10, achieving an accuracy of 93.94%. Contrary to
expectations, all examined distillation strategies led to reduced accuracy
compared to baseline training. These findings indicate that architectural
adaptation can be more impactful than distillation in small-scale image
classification tasks, highlighting the need for further research on effective
model design and advanced distillation techniques for low-resolution domains.

AI.tldr: 本文针对资源受限设备，提出GhostNetV3-Small模型以优化低分辨率输入处理，并在CIFAR-10上取得93.94%的准确率，发现架构适应比知识蒸馏更有效。
AI.motivation: 深度神经网络计算需求高，不适用于资源受限的边缘设备。需要探索模型压缩和适应策略以实现高效推理。
AI.method: 1. 提出GhostNetV3-Small，一种GhostNetV3的修改变体，旨在提高其在CIFAR-10等低分辨率输入上的性能。2. 比较评估多种知识蒸馏技术，包括传统知识蒸馏、教师助手和教师集成。
AI.result: 1. GhostNetV3-Small在CIFAR-10上显著优于原始GhostNetV3，准确率达到93.94%。2. 所有测试的知识蒸馏策略均导致准确率低于基线训练。
AI.conclusion: 在小规模图像分类任务中，架构适应可能比知识蒸馏更具影响力。这表明需要进一步研究低分辨率领域的有效模型设计和高级蒸馏技术。

title: InJecteD: Analyzing Trajectories and Drift Dynamics in Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models for 2D Point Cloud Generation
summary:
This work introduces InJecteD, a framework for interpreting Denoising
Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs) by analyzing sample trajectories during
the denoising process of 2D point cloud generation. We apply this framework to
three datasets from the Datasaurus Dozen bullseye, dino, and circle using a
simplified DDPM architecture with customizable input and time embeddings. Our
approach quantifies trajectory properties, including displacement, velocity,
clustering, and drift field dynamics, using statistical metrics such as
Wasserstein distance and cosine similarity. By enhancing model transparency,
InJecteD supports human AI collaboration by enabling practitioners to debug and
refine generative models. Experiments reveal distinct denoising phases: initial
noise exploration, rapid shape formation, and final refinement, with
dataset-specific behaviors example, bullseyes concentric convergence vs. dinos
complex contour formation. We evaluate four model configurations, varying
embeddings and noise schedules, demonstrating that Fourier based embeddings
improve trajectory stability and reconstruction quality

AI.tldr: InJecteD是一个解释DDPMs的框架，通过分析2D点云生成去噪过程中的样本轨迹，以提高模型透明度并辅助调试。
AI.motivation: 提高去噪扩散概率模型（DDPMs）的透明度，支持人机协作，并使从业者能够调试和改进生成模型。
AI.method: 引入InJecteD框架，分析DDPMs在2D点云生成去噪过程中的样本轨迹。应用于Datasaurus Dozen的三个数据集（bullseye, dino, circle），使用简化的DDPM架构和可定制的嵌入。通过统计指标（如Wasserstein距离和余弦相似度）量化轨迹属性（位移、速度、聚类、漂移场动力学）。评估了四种模型配置，改变嵌入和噪声调度。
AI.result: 实验揭示了不同的去噪阶段：初始噪声探索、快速形状形成和最终细化，并观察到数据集特定的行为。基于傅里叶的嵌入提高了轨迹稳定性和重建质量。
AI.conclusion: InJecteD框架通过分析去噪轨迹，有效增强了DDPMs的透明度，为理解和优化生成模型提供了深刻见解，傅里叶嵌入对模型性能有积极影响。

title: A Dimensionality-Reduced XAI Framework for Roundabout Crash Severity Insights
comment:
This is the author's preprint version of a paper accepted for
  presentation at HICSS 59 (Hawaii International Conference on System
  Sciences), 2026, Hawaii, USA. The final published version will appear in the
  official conference proceedings. Conference site: https://hicss.hawaii.edu/
summary:
Roundabouts reduce severe crashes, yet risk patterns vary by conditions. This
study analyzes 2017-2021 Ohio roundabout crashes using a two-step, explainable
workflow. Cluster Correspondence Analysis (CCA) identifies co-occurring factors
and yields four crash patterns. A tree-based severity model is then interpreted
with SHAP to quantify drivers of injury within and across patterns. Results
show higher severity when darkness, wet surfaces, and higher posted speeds
coincide with fixed-object or angle events, and lower severity in clear,
low-speed settings. Pattern-specific explanations highlight mechanisms at
entries (fail-to-yield, gap acceptance), within multi-lane circulation
(improper maneuvers), and during slow-downs (rear-end). The workflow links
pattern discovery with case-level explanations, supporting site screening,
countermeasure selection, and audit-ready reporting. The contribution to
Information Systems is a practical template for usable XAI in public safety
analytics.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析俄亥俄州环岛事故数据，通过两步可解释工作流识别事故模式及其严重程度驱动因素，并为公共安全分析中的可解释AI提供实用模板。
AI.motivation: 尽管环岛能减少严重事故，但事故风险模式因具体条件而异，需要深入理解事故发生机制及严重程度的影响因素。
AI.method: 采用两步可解释工作流：首先，使用聚类对应分析（CCA）识别共同出现的因素和四种事故模式；其次，构建基于树的严重程度模型，并结合SHAP解释器量化损伤驱动因素。
AI.result: 结果显示，在黑暗、湿滑路面、高限速下发生的固定物体或角度碰撞事故严重程度更高，而在清晰、低速环境下则较低。模式特异性解释揭示了入口（未让行、间隙接受）、多车道环形路（不当操作）和减速（追尾）时的事故机制。
AI.conclusion: 该工作流将模式发现与案例级解释相结合，支持现场筛选、对策选择和报告。它为信息系统领域在公共安全分析中应用可解释AI提供了一个实用的模板。

title: Mitigating Strategy Preference Bias in Emotional Support Conversation via Uncertainty Estimations
summary:
Emotional support conversation (ESC) aims to alleviate distress through
empathetic dialogue, yet large language models (LLMs) face persistent
challenges in delivering effective ESC due to low accuracy in strategy
planning. Moreover, there is a considerable preference bias towards specific
strategies. Prior methods using fine-tuned strategy planners have shown
potential in reducing such bias, while the underlying causes of the preference
bias in LLMs have not well been studied. To address these issues, we first
reveal the fundamental causes of the bias by identifying the knowledge
boundaries of LLMs in strategy planning. Then, we propose an approach to
mitigate the bias by reinforcement learning with a dual reward function, which
optimizes strategy planning via both accuracy and entropy-based confidence for
each region according to the knowledge boundaries. Experiments on the ESCov and
ExTES datasets with multiple LLM backbones show that our approach outperforms
the baselines, confirming the effectiveness of our approach.

AI.tldr: 针对大型语言模型（LLMs）在情感支持对话（ESC）中策略规划准确性低和策略偏好偏差问题，本文首先揭示了偏差的根本原因，然后提出一种基于强化学习和双重奖励（结合准确性和熵置信度）的方法来缓解偏差，实验证明该方法有效。
AI.motivation: LLMs在情感支持对话的策略规划中面临准确性低和明显的策略偏好偏差。现有方法虽能一定程度减少偏差，但其根本原因尚未被充分研究，导致难以有效解决这些问题。
AI.method: 首先，通过识别LLMs在策略规划中的知识边界，揭示策略偏好偏差的根本原因。然后，提出一种基于强化学习的方法，该方法使用双重奖励函数，根据知识边界对每个区域同时优化策略规划的准确性和基于熵的置信度，从而缓解偏差。
AI.result: 在ESCov和ExTES数据集上，使用多个LLM骨干模型进行的实验表明，所提出的方法优于基线方法。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的方法能够有效提高LLMs在情感支持对话中策略规划的准确性，并缓解策略偏好偏差。

title: From Orthomosaics to Raw UAV Imagery: Enhancing Palm Detection and Crown-Center Localization
summary:
Accurate mapping of individual trees is essential for ecological monitoring
and forest management. Orthomosaic imagery from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs)
is widely used, but stitching artifacts and heavy preprocessing limit its
suitability for field deployment. This study explores the use of raw UAV
imagery for palm detection and crown-center localization in tropical forests.
Two research questions are addressed: (1) how detection performance varies
across orthomosaic and raw imagery, including within-domain and cross-domain
transfer, and (2) to what extent crown-center annotations improve localization
accuracy beyond bounding-box centroids. Using state-of-the-art detectors and
keypoint models, we show that raw imagery yields superior performance in
deployment-relevant scenarios, while orthomosaics retain value for robust
cross-domain generalization. Incorporating crown-center annotations in training
further improves localization and provides precise tree positions for
downstream ecological analyses. These findings offer practical guidance for
UAV-based biodiversity and conservation monitoring.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，在热带森林中进行棕榈树检测和冠心定位时，原始无人机影像在实际部署中表现优于正射影像，而正射影像在跨域泛化方面表现出色。引入冠心标注进一步提高了定位精度。
AI.motivation: 个体树木的精确测绘对生态监测和森林管理至关重要。传统的无人机正射影像存在拼接伪影和大量预处理的局限性，不适用于野外部署，因此需要探索使用原始无人机影像的潜力。
AI.method: 本研究探讨了使用原始无人机影像进行棕榈树检测和冠心定位。它回答了两个研究问题：1) 正射影像和原始影像（包括域内和跨域迁移）的检测性能差异；2) 冠心标注在多大程度上提高了超越边界框中心的定位精度。研究使用了最先进的检测器和关键点模型。
AI.result: 研究表明，原始无人机影像在与部署相关的场景中表现出卓越的性能，而正射影像在稳健的跨域泛化方面仍有价值。在训练中融入冠心标注进一步提高了定位精度，并为后续生态分析提供了精确的树木位置。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现为基于无人机的生物多样性和保护监测提供了实用的指导。

title: Why and How Auxiliary Tasks Improve JEPA Representations
summary:
Joint-Embedding Predictive Architecture (JEPA) is increasingly used for
visual representation learning and as a component in model-based RL, but its
behavior remains poorly understood. We provide a theoretical characterization
of a simple, practical JEPA variant that has an auxiliary regression head
trained jointly with latent dynamics. We prove a No Unhealthy Representation
Collapse theorem: in deterministic MDPs, if training drives both the
latent-transition consistency loss and the auxiliary regression loss to zero,
then any pair of non-equivalent observations, i.e., those that do not have the
same transition dynamics or auxiliary label, must map to distinct latent
representations. Thus, the auxiliary task anchors which distinctions the
representation must preserve. Controlled ablations in a counting environment
corroborate the theory and show that training the JEPA model jointly with the
auxiliary head generates a richer representation than training them separately.
Our work indicates a path to improve JEPA encoders: training them with an
auxiliary function that, together with the transition dynamics, encodes the
right equivalence relations.

AI.tldr: JEPA行为理解不足。本文理论分析并实验验证了一种带有辅助回归头并联合训练的JEPA变体，证明其能有效防止表示坍塌，并生成更丰富的表示，为JEPA改进指明方向。
AI.motivation: 尽管联合嵌入预测架构（JEPA）在视觉表示学习和模型基强化学习中应用日益广泛，但其行为机制和原理仍缺乏深入理解。
AI.method: 提出并理论分析了一种简单的JEPA变体，该变体包含一个辅助回归头，并与潜在动力学共同训练。通过理论推导证明其特性，并辅以在计数环境中的受控消融实验进行验证。
AI.result: 理论上证明了“无不健康表示坍塌定理”：在特定条件下，非等价观测（即转移动态或辅助标签不同）将被映射到不同的潜在表示，辅助任务在此过程中锚定关键区别。实验证实，联合训练JEPA模型与辅助头能生成比单独训练更丰富的表示。
AI.conclusion: 本研究揭示了辅助任务在防止表示坍PA中的关键作用，并为未来改进JEPA编码器提供了方向：即通过引入与转移动态共同编码正确等价关系的辅助函数来训练JEPA编码器。

title: zELO: ELO-inspired Training Method for Rerankers and Embedding Models
summary:
We introduce a novel training methodology named zELO, which optimizes
retrieval performance via the analysis that ranking tasks are statically
equivalent to a Thurstone model. Based on the zELO method, we use unsupervised
data in order train a suite of state-of-the-art open-weight reranker models:
zerank-1 and zerank-1-small. These models achieve the highest retrieval scores
in multiple domains, including finance, legal, code, and STEM, outperforming
closed-source proprietary rerankers on both NDCG@10 and Recall. These models
also demonstrate great versatility, maintaining their 0-shot performance on
out-of-domain and private customer datasets. The training data included 112,000
queries and 100 documents per query, and was trained end-to-end from
unannotated queries and documents in less than 10,000 H100-hours.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种名为zELO的新型训练方法，通过将排序任务视为Thurstone模型的静态等价，使用无监督数据训练出zerank-1和zerank-1-small两款开放权重重排序模型。这些模型在金融、法律、代码和STEM等多个领域实现了最高的检索分数，超越了闭源专有重排序器，并展现出优异的零样本泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 优化检索性能，开发出高性能、开放权重的重排序模型，以超越现有技术并解决多领域检索任务的挑战。
AI.method: 引入zELO训练方法，该方法将排序任务分析为与Thurstone模型静态等价。基于zELO，利用无监督数据训练了zerank-1和zerank-1-small两款开放权重重排序模型。训练过程端到端，使用112,000个未标注查询和每个查询100个文档，总训练时间少于10,000 H100小时。
AI.result: zerank模型在金融、法律、代码和STEM等多个领域取得了最高的检索分数，并在NDCG@10和Recall指标上均超越了闭源专有重排序器。此外，模型还展现出强大的通用性，在领域外和私有客户数据集上保持了优秀的零样本性能。
AI.conclusion: zELO方法及其训练的zerank开放权重重排序模型在多个领域检索任务中表现卓越，性能超越了现有闭源模型，并具备出色的泛化能力，为高质量的检索重排序提供了一个新的、高效的解决方案。

title: Chat-Driven Text Generation and Interaction for Person Retrieval
summary:
Text-based person search (TBPS) enables the retrieval of person images from
large-scale databases using natural language descriptions, offering critical
value in surveillance applications. However, a major challenge lies in the
labor-intensive process of obtaining high-quality textual annotations, which
limits scalability and practical deployment. To address this, we introduce two
complementary modules: Multi-Turn Text Generation (MTG) and Multi-Turn Text
Interaction (MTI). MTG generates rich pseudo-labels through simulated dialogues
with MLLMs, producing fine-grained and diverse visual descriptions without
manual supervision. MTI refines user queries at inference time through dynamic,
dialogue-based reasoning, enabling the system to interpret and resolve vague,
incomplete, or ambiguous descriptions - characteristics often seen in
real-world search scenarios. Together, MTG and MTI form a unified and
annotation-free framework that significantly improves retrieval accuracy,
robustness, and usability. Extensive evaluations demonstrate that our method
achieves competitive or superior results while eliminating the need for manual
captions, paving the way for scalable and practical deployment of TBPS systems.

AI.tldr: 提出一个无需手动标注的文本行人搜索（TBPS）框架，通过多轮文本生成（MTG）和多轮文本交互（MTI）显著提升检索准确性、鲁棒性和可用性。
AI.motivation: 文本行人搜索（TBPS）系统需要高质量的文本标注，但标注过程劳动密集，严重限制了其可扩展性和实际部署。
AI.method: 引入两个互补模块：多轮文本生成（MTG）和多轮文本交互（MTI）。MTG通过与多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）的模拟对话生成丰富的伪标签，实现无监督的细粒度视觉描述。MTI在推理时通过动态对话推理优化用户查询，解决模糊、不完整或歧义的描述问题。两者共同构成了一个统一且无需标注的框架。
AI.result: 广泛评估表明，该方法在无需手动标注的情况下，取得了有竞争力或更优的检索准确性、鲁棒性和可用性。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为文本行人搜索（TBPS）系统的可扩展和实际部署奠定了基础，解决了高质量文本标注的瓶颈问题。

title: DYNAMO: Dependency-Aware Deep Learning Framework for Articulated Assembly Motion Prediction
summary:
Understanding the motion of articulated mechanical assemblies from static
geometry remains a core challenge in 3D perception and design automation. Prior
work on everyday articulated objects such as doors and laptops typically
assumes simplified kinematic structures or relies on joint annotations.
However, in mechanical assemblies like gears, motion arises from geometric
coupling, through meshing teeth or aligned axes, making it difficult for
existing methods to reason about relational motion from geometry alone. To
address this gap, we introduce MechBench, a benchmark dataset of 693 diverse
synthetic gear assemblies with part-wise ground-truth motion trajectories.
MechBench provides a structured setting to study coupled motion, where part
dynamics are induced by contact and transmission rather than predefined joints.
Building on this, we propose DYNAMO, a dependency-aware neural model that
predicts per-part SE(3) motion trajectories directly from segmented CAD point
clouds. Experiments show that DYNAMO outperforms strong baselines, achieving
accurate and temporally consistent predictions across varied gear
configurations. Together, MechBench and DYNAMO establish a novel systematic
framework for data-driven learning of coupled mechanical motion in CAD
assemblies.

AI.tldr: 本文提出MechBench数据集和DYNAMO模型，旨在从静态CAD点云预测齿轮组件中耦合机械运动，克服现有方法在几何耦合运动推理上的局限性。
AI.motivation: 从静态几何理解铰接机械组件运动是3D感知和设计自动化的核心挑战。现有方法通常假设简化运动学结构或依赖关节标注，难以处理齿轮等机械组件中由几何耦合（啮合齿、对齐轴）产生的运动。
AI.method: 1. 引入MechBench：一个包含693个多样化合成齿轮组件的基准数据集，提供零件级别的真实运动轨迹，用于研究由接触和传动引起的耦合运动。2. 提出DYNAMO：一个依赖感知神经网络模型，直接从分段CAD点云预测每个零件的SE(3)运动轨迹。
AI.result: 实验表明，DYNAMO模型在各种齿轮配置下，均优于现有强基线模型，实现了准确且时间一致的预测。
AI.conclusion: MechBench数据集和DYNAMO模型共同建立了一个新颖的系统框架，用于CAD组件中耦合机械运动的数据驱动学习。

title: Representation Learning on Large Non-Bipartite Transaction Networks using GraphSAGE
summary:
Financial institutions increasingly require scalable tools to analyse complex
transactional networks, yet traditional graph embedding methods struggle with
dynamic, real-world banking data. This paper demonstrates the practical
application of GraphSAGE, an inductive Graph Neural Network framework, to
non-bipartite heterogeneous transaction networks within a banking context.
Unlike transductive approaches, GraphSAGE scales well to large networks and can
generalise to unseen nodes which is critical for institutions working with
temporally evolving transactional data. We construct a transaction network
using anonymised customer and merchant transactions and train a GraphSAGE model
to generate node embeddings. Our exploratory work on the embeddings reveals
interpretable clusters aligned with geographic and demographic attributes.
Additionally, we illustrate their utility in downstream classification tasks by
applying them to a money mule detection model where using these embeddings
improves the prioritisation of high-risk accounts. Beyond fraud detection, our
work highlights the adaptability of this framework to banking-scale networks,
emphasising its inductive capability, scalability, and interpretability. This
study provides a blueprint for financial organisations to harness graph machine
learning for actionable insights in transactional ecosystems.

AI.tldr: 本研究展示了GraphSAGE在银行交易网络中的实际应用，生成了可解释的节点嵌入，并显著提升了洗钱骡子检测等下游任务的性能，为金融机构利用图机器学习提供了可扩展的解决方案。
AI.motivation: 金融机构需要可扩展的工具来分析复杂的交易网络，但传统图嵌入方法难以处理动态、真实的银行数据，无法很好地扩展或泛化到未见节点。
AI.method: 将GraphSAGE（一种归纳式图神经网络框架）应用于银行背景下的非二分异构交易网络。具体方法是使用匿名客户和商家交易构建交易网络，并训练GraphSAGE模型以生成节点嵌入。
AI.result: 生成的节点嵌入揭示了与地理和人口统计属性一致的可解释集群。此外，将这些嵌入应用于洗钱骡子检测模型时，显著提高了高风险账户的优先级。
AI.conclusion: 本工作突出了GraphSAGE框架在银行级网络中的适应性、归纳能力、可扩展性和可解释性，为金融机构利用图机器学习从交易生态系统中获取可操作的洞察提供了实施蓝图。

title: Human + AI for Accelerating Ad Localization Evaluation
summary:
Adapting advertisements for multilingual audiences requires more than simple
text translation; it demands preservation of visual consistency, spatial
alignment, and stylistic integrity across diverse languages and formats. We
introduce a structured framework that combines automated components with human
oversight to address the complexities of advertisement localization. To the
best of our knowledge, this is the first work to integrate scene text
detection, inpainting, machine translation (MT), and text reimposition
specifically for accelerating ad localization evaluation workflows. Qualitative
results across six locales demonstrate that our approach produces semantically
accurate and visually coherent localized advertisements, suitable for
deployment in real-world workflows.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出一个结合自动化工具（场景文本检测、图像修复、机器翻译、文本重置）与人工监督的框架，用于高效且视觉一致的广告本地化，尤其针对评估工作流程加速。
AI.motivation: 广告本地化不仅是文本翻译，还需要在多种语言和格式中保持视觉一致性、空间对齐和风格完整性，这比简单翻译更为复杂。
AI.method: 引入一个结合自动化组件和人工监督的结构化框架。该框架首次集成了场景文本检测、图像修复、机器翻译（MT）和文本重新放置，专门用于加速广告本地化评估工作流程。
AI.result: 在六个地区进行的定性结果表明，该方法能够生成语义准确且视觉连贯的本地化广告。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的方法能够有效地生成适合实际部署的、高质量的本地化广告，并显著加速其评估工作流程。

title: Towards Inclusive Toxic Content Moderation: Addressing Vulnerabilities to Adversarial Attacks in Toxicity Classifiers Tackling LLM-generated Content
summary:
The volume of machine-generated content online has grown dramatically due to
the widespread use of Large Language Models (LLMs), leading to new challenges
for content moderation systems. Conventional content moderation classifiers,
which are usually trained on text produced by humans, suffer from
misclassifications due to LLM-generated text deviating from their training data
and adversarial attacks that aim to avoid detection. Present-day defence
tactics are reactive rather than proactive, since they rely on adversarial
training or external detection models to identify attacks. In this work, we aim
to identify the vulnerable components of toxicity classifiers that contribute
to misclassification, proposing a novel strategy based on mechanistic
interpretability techniques. Our study focuses on fine-tuned BERT and RoBERTa
classifiers, testing on diverse datasets spanning a variety of minority groups.
We use adversarial attacking techniques to identify vulnerable circuits.
Finally, we suppress these vulnerable circuits, improving performance against
adversarial attacks. We also provide demographic-level insights into these
vulnerable circuits, exposing fairness and robustness gaps in model training.
We find that models have distinct heads that are either crucial for performance
or vulnerable to attack and suppressing the vulnerable heads improves
performance on adversarial input. We also find that different heads are
responsible for vulnerability across different demographic groups, which can
inform more inclusive development of toxicity detection models.

AI.tldr: 本文利用机制可解释性技术，识别并抑制BERT和RoBERTa毒性分类器中易受对抗攻击的脆弱组件（注意力头），有效提升了模型在对抗输入下的性能，并揭示了不同人口群体的公平性与鲁棒性差异。
AI.motivation: 由于LLM生成内容激增，传统内容审核分类器在处理LLM文本和对抗攻击时面临误分类挑战，且现有防御策略多为被动式。本研究旨在主动识别毒性分类器中导致误分类的脆弱组件。
AI.method: 提出一种基于机制可解释性技术的新策略，用于识别毒性分类器的脆弱组件。研究聚焦于微调后的BERT和RoBERTa模型，并在包含多样化少数群体的多个数据集上进行测试。通过对抗攻击技术识别脆弱电路（注意力头），然后抑制这些脆弱电路以提高性能。同时，提供对脆弱电路的人口统计学层面洞察。
AI.result: 研究发现模型具有对性能至关重要或易受攻击的独特注意力头；抑制这些脆弱的注意力头能有效提高模型在对抗输入下的性能。此外，不同注意力头对不同人口群体表现出不同的脆弱性。
AI.conclusion: 通过识别和抑制毒性检测模型中的脆弱注意力头，可显著提升其对抗攻击的鲁棒性。对脆弱组件的人口统计学洞察为开发更具包容性的毒性检测模型提供了指导，有助于弥合模型训练中的公平性和鲁棒性差距。

title: Cott-ADNet: Lightweight Real-Time Cotton Boll and Flower Detection Under Field Conditions
summary:
Cotton is one of the most important natural fiber crops worldwide, yet
harvesting remains limited by labor-intensive manual picking, low efficiency,
and yield losses from missing the optimal harvest window. Accurate recognition
of cotton bolls and their maturity is therefore essential for automation, yield
estimation, and breeding research. We propose Cott-ADNet, a lightweight
real-time detector tailored to cotton boll and flower recognition under complex
field conditions. Building on YOLOv11n, Cott-ADNet enhances spatial
representation and robustness through improved convolutional designs, while
introducing two new modules: a NeLU-enhanced Global Attention Mechanism to
better capture weak and low-contrast features, and a Dilated Receptive Field
SPPF to expand receptive fields for more effective multi-scale context modeling
at low computational cost. We curate a labeled dataset of 4,966 images, and
release an external validation set of 1,216 field images to support future
research. Experiments show that Cott-ADNet achieves 91.5% Precision, 89.8%
Recall, 93.3% mAP50, 71.3% mAP, and 90.6% F1-Score with only 7.5 GFLOPs,
maintaining stable performance under multi-scale and rotational variations.
These results demonstrate Cott-ADNet as an accurate and efficient solution for
in-field deployment, and thus provide a reliable basis for automated cotton
harvesting and high-throughput phenotypic analysis. Code and dataset is
available at https://github.com/SweefongWong/Cott-ADNet.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Cott-ADNet，一种基于YOLOv11n的轻量级实时棉铃花朵检测器，通过改进卷积设计、引入NeLU增强的全局注意力机制和扩张感受野SPPF模块，在复杂田间条件下实现高精度和效率，支持棉花自动化采摘和表型分析。
AI.motivation: 棉花采摘效率低且劳动密集型，人工采摘易错过最佳采摘期导致减产。因此，准确识别棉铃及其成熟度对于实现自动化采摘、产量评估和育种研究至关重要。
AI.method: 提出Cott-ADNet，一个基于YOLOv11n的轻量级实时检测器。它通过改进卷积设计增强空间表示和鲁棒性，并引入两个新模块：NeLU增强的全局注意力机制（用于捕获弱和低对比度特征）和扩张感受野SPPF模块（以低计算成本实现多尺度上下文建模）。同时，构建了一个包含4,966张标注图像的数据集，并发布了1,216张田间图像的外部验证集。
AI.result: Cott-ADNet在仅7.5 GFLOPs下，实现了91.5%的精确率、89.8%的召回率、93.3%的mAP50、71.3%的mAP和90.6%的F1-Score，并在多尺度和旋转变化下保持稳定性能。
AI.conclusion: Cott-ADNet被证明是一种准确高效的田间部署解决方案，为棉花自动化采摘和高通量表型分析提供了可靠的基础。

title: Quantum-Inspired Stacked Integrated Concept Graph Model (QISICGM) for Diabetes Risk Prediction
comment:
13 pages, 3 figures, includes performance tables and visualizations.
  Proposes a Quantum-Inspired Stacked Integrated Concept Graph Model (QISICGM)
  that integrates phase feature mapping, self-improving concept graphs, and
  neighborhood sequence modeling within a stacked ensemble. Demonstrates
  improved F1 and AUC on an augmented PIMA Diabetes dataset with efficient CPU
  inference
summary:
The Quantum-Inspired Stacked Integrated Concept Graph Model (QISICGM) is an
innovative machine learning framework that harnesses quantum-inspired
techniques to predict diabetes risk with exceptional accuracy and efficiency.
Utilizing the PIMA Indians Diabetes dataset augmented with 2,000 synthetic
samples to mitigate class imbalance (total: 2,768 samples, 1,949 positives),
QISICGM integrates a self-improving concept graph with a stacked ensemble
comprising Random Forests (RF), Extra Trees (ET), transformers, convolutional
neural networks (CNNs), and feed-forward neural networks (FFNNs). This approach
achieves an out-of-fold (OOF) F1 score of 0.8933 and an AUC of 0.8699,
outperforming traditional methods. Quantum inspired elements, such as phase
feature mapping and neighborhood sequence modeling, enrich feature
representations, enabling CPU-efficient inference at 8.5 rows per second. This
paper presents a detailed architecture, theoretical foundations, code insights,
and performance evaluations, including visualizations from the outputs
subfolder. The open-source implementation (v1.0.0) is available at
https://github.com/keninayoung/QISICGM, positioning QISICGM as a potential
benchmark for AI-assisted clinical triage in diabetes and beyond. Ultimately,
this work emphasizes trustworthy AI through calibration, interpretability, and
open-source reproducibility.

AI.tldr: QISICGM是一个结合量子启发技术、概念图和堆叠集成学习的创新机器学习框架，通过增强PIMA数据集，以高精度和效率预测糖尿病风险，其F1和AUC表现优于传统方法，并强调可信赖AI。
AI.motivation: 开发一个创新且高效的机器学习框架，利用量子启发技术高精度预测糖尿病风险，同时解决传统方法可能存在的局限性以及数据集的类不平衡问题。
AI.method: 提出量子启发堆叠集成概念图模型（QISICGM），该模型整合了自改进概念图与包含随机森林、Extra Trees、transformers、CNNs和FFNNs的堆叠集成学习。模型利用相位特征映射和邻域序列建模等量子启发元素增强特征表示。使用PIMA印第安糖尿病数据集，并额外生成2000个合成样本以缓解类别不平衡问题。
AI.result: QISICGM在增强的数据集上取得了0.8933的OOF F1分数和0.8699的AUC，性能优于传统方法。该模型实现了每秒8.5行的CPU高效推理速度。
AI.conclusion: QISICGM模型在糖尿病风险预测方面表现出卓越的准确性和效率，有望成为AI辅助临床分诊领域的潜在基准。本研究强调了通过校准、可解释性和开源重现性来构建可信赖AI的重要性。

title: Redefining CX with Agentic AI: Minerva CQ Case Study
summary:
Despite advances in AI for contact centers, customer experience (CX)
continues to suffer from high average handling time (AHT), low first-call
resolution, and poor customer satisfaction (CSAT). A key driver is the
cognitive load on agents, who must navigate fragmented systems, troubleshoot
manually, and frequently place customers on hold. Existing AI-powered
agent-assist tools are often reactive driven by static rules, simple prompting,
or retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) without deeper contextual reasoning. We
introduce Agentic AI goal-driven, autonomous, tool-using systems that
proactively support agents in real time. Unlike conventional approaches,
Agentic AI identifies customer intent, triggers modular workflows, maintains
evolving context, and adapts dynamically to conversation state. This paper
presents a case study of Minerva CQ, a real-time Agent Assist product deployed
in voice-based customer support. Minerva CQ integrates real-time transcription,
intent and sentiment detection, entity recognition, contextual retrieval,
dynamic customer profiling, and partial conversational summaries enabling
proactive workflows and continuous context-building. Deployed in live
production, Minerva CQ acts as an AI co-pilot, delivering measurable
improvements in agent efficiency and customer experience across multiple
deployments.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种名为“Agentic AI”的新型AI助理系统（Minerva CQ），通过主动支持和深度上下文推理，帮助联络中心座席减少认知负荷，从而提高工作效率和客户体验，克服了现有被动式AI工具的局限性。
AI.motivation: 联络中心客户体验（CX）因平均处理时间（AHT）高、首次呼叫解决率低和客户满意度（CSAT）差而持续受损。主要原因是座席需要应对碎片化系统、手动故障排除以及频繁让客户等待，导致认知负荷过重。现有AI座席辅助工具多为被动式，依赖静态规则、简单提示或检索增强生成（RAG），缺乏深层上下文推理能力。
AI.method: 引入了“Agentic AI”，这是一种目标驱动、自主、工具使用的系统，旨在实时主动支持座席。它通过识别客户意图、触发模块化工作流程、维护演进的上下文并根据对话状态动态调整。文章以Minerva CQ为例，该产品整合了实时转录、意图和情绪检测、实体识别、上下文检索、动态客户画像和部分对话摘要，从而实现主动工作流和持续的上下文构建。
AI.result: Minerva CQ作为AI副驾驶，在实际生产环境中部署后，在多次部署中均实现了座席效率和客户体验的显著提升。
AI.conclusion: Agentic AI（如Minerva CQ）通过提供实时、主动、上下文感知的支持，有效解决了联络中心座席的认知负荷问题和现有AI工具的局限性，显著改善了座席效率和客户体验。

title: Case-Based Decision-Theoretic Decoding with Quality Memories
summary:
Minimum Bayes risk (MBR) decoding is a decision rule of text generation,
which selects the hypothesis that maximizes the expected utility and robustly
generates higher-quality texts than maximum a posteriori (MAP) decoding.
However, it depends on sample texts drawn from the text generation model; thus,
it is difficult to find a hypothesis that correctly captures the knowledge or
information of out-of-domain. To tackle this issue, we propose case-based
decision-theoretic (CBDT) decoding, another method to estimate the expected
utility using examples of domain data. CBDT decoding not only generates
higher-quality texts than MAP decoding, but also the combination of MBR and
CBDT decoding outperformed MBR decoding in seven domain De--En and
Ja$\leftrightarrow$En translation tasks and image captioning tasks on MSCOCO
and nocaps datasets.

AI.tldr: 为解决MBR解码在域外知识捕获上的局限性，本文提出CBDT解码，利用领域数据示例估计期望效用，不仅超越MAP解码，而且与MBR结合后在多项翻译和图像字幕任务中表现优于单独的MBR。
AI.motivation: 现有最小贝叶斯风险（MBR）解码依赖于模型生成的样本文本，难以正确捕获域外知识或信息。
AI.method: 提出基于案例的决策理论（CBDT）解码方法，通过使用领域数据示例来估计期望效用。
AI.result: CBDT解码生成的文本质量高于最大后验概率（MAP）解码。将MBR与CBDT解码结合，在七个域内德-英和日↔英翻译任务以及MSCOCO和nocaps数据集上的图像字幕任务中均优于单独的MBR解码。
AI.conclusion: CBDT解码能有效提高文本生成质量，且与MBR解码结合后能进一步超越MBR，尤其在处理领域特定信息时表现优异。

title: Deep learning for 3D point cloud processing -- from approaches, tasks to its implications on urban and environmental applications
summary:
Point cloud processing as a fundamental task in the field of geomatics and
computer vision, has been supporting tasks and applications at different scales
from air to ground, including mapping, environmental monitoring, urban/tree
structure modeling, automated driving, robotics, disaster responses etc. Due to
the rapid development of deep learning, point cloud processing algorithms have
nowadays been almost explicitly dominated by learning-based approaches, most of
which are yet transitioned into real-world practices. Existing surveys
primarily focus on the ever-updating network architecture to accommodate
unordered point clouds, largely ignoring their practical values in typical
point cloud processing applications, in which extra-large volume of data,
diverse scene contents, varying point density, data modality need to be
considered. In this paper, we provide a meta review on deep learning approaches
and datasets that cover a selection of critical tasks of point cloud processing
in use such as scene completion, registration, semantic segmentation, and
modeling. By reviewing a broad range of urban and environmental applications
these tasks can support, we identify gaps to be closed as these methods
transformed into applications and draw concluding remarks in both the
algorithmic and practical aspects of the surveyed methods.

AI.tldr: 深度学习虽主导点云处理，但向实际应用转化面临挑战。本文通过元综述，聚焦实用价值，识别了方法转化中的差距。
AI.motivation: 现有深度学习点云处理方法尚未充分应用于实际场景；现有综述主要关注网络架构，忽视了实际应用中大数据量、场景多样性、点密度和数据模态等实用价值。
AI.method: 对深度学习点云处理方法和数据集进行元综述，涵盖场景补全、配准、语义分割和建模等关键任务，并审视其在城市和环境应用中的支持作用。
AI.result: 识别了深度学习点云处理方法在转化为实际应用过程中需要弥合的差距。
AI.conclusion: 对所综述方法的算法和实践两方面提出了总结性意见。

title: Explainable Fraud Detection with GNNExplainer and Shapley Values
summary:
The risk of financial fraud is increasing as digital payments are used more
and more frequently. Although the use of artificial intelligence systems for
fraud detection is widespread, society and regulators have raised the standards
for these systems' transparency for reliability verification purposes. To
increase their effectiveness in conducting fraud investigations, fraud analysts
also profit from having concise and understandable explanations. To solve these
challenges, the paper will concentrate on developing an explainable fraud
detector.

AI.tldr: 为应对数字支付欺诈风险并满足AI透明度需求，本文旨在开发一个可解释的欺诈检测器。
AI.motivation: 随着数字支付的普及，金融欺诈风险日益增加。社会和监管机构对用于欺诈检测的AI系统提出了更高的透明度要求，以验证其可靠性。同时，欺诈分析师需要简洁易懂的解释来提高调查效率。
AI.method: 本文将专注于开发一个可解释的欺诈检测器。
AI.result: 未提及。
AI.conclusion: 为解决数字支付欺诈风险、AI系统透明度需求以及欺诈调查解释性不足的问题，本论文将致力于开发一种可解释的欺诈检测系统。

title: Match Chat: Real Time Generative AI and Generative Computing for Tennis
summary:
We present Match Chat, a real-time, agent-driven assistant designed to
enhance the tennis fan experience by delivering instant, accurate responses to
match-related queries. Match Chat integrates Generative Artificial Intelligence
(GenAI) with Generative Computing (GenComp) techniques to synthesize key
insights during live tennis singles matches. The system debuted at the 2025
Wimbledon Championships and the 2025 US Open, where it provided about 1 million
users with seamless access to streaming and static data through natural
language queries. The architecture is grounded in an Agent-Oriented
Architecture (AOA) combining rule engines, predictive models, and agents to
pre-process and optimize user queries before passing them to GenAI components.
The Match Chat system had an answer accuracy of 92.83% with an average response
time of 6.25 seconds under loads of up to 120 requests per second (RPS). Over
96.08% of all queries were guided using interactive prompt design, contributing
to a user experience that prioritized clarity, responsiveness, and minimal
effort. The system was designed to mask architectural complexity, offering a
frictionless and intuitive interface that required no onboarding or technical
familiarity. Across both Grand Slam deployments, Match Chat maintained 100%
uptime and supported nearly 1 million unique users, underscoring the
scalability and reliability of the platform. This work introduces key design
patterns for real-time, consumer-facing AI systems that emphasize speed,
precision, and usability that highlights a practical path for deploying
performant agentic systems in dynamic environments.

AI.tldr: Match Chat是一个实时的代理驱动AI助手，通过整合GenAI和GenComp技术，为网球迷提供即时、准确的比赛信息，并在两次大满贯赛事中成功服务了约百万用户，展现出高准确性、低延迟和高可靠性。
AI.motivation: 提升网球迷的体验，通过即时、准确地响应与比赛相关的查询。
AI.method: 该系统采用代理导向架构（AOA），结合生成式人工智能（GenAI）和生成式计算（GenComp）技术，并整合规则引擎、预测模型和代理来预处理和优化用户查询。
AI.result: 在2025年温网和美网期间，Match Chat为约100万用户提供了服务。系统在高达每秒120次请求（RPS）的负载下，答复准确率达到92.83%，平均响应时间为6.25秒。超过96.08%的查询通过交互式提示设计进行引导。在两次大满贯部署中，系统保持了100%的正常运行时间，并支持了近100万独立用户，展现了出色的可伸缩性和可靠性。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为实时、面向消费者的AI系统提供了关键的设计模式，强调速度、精度和可用性，为在动态环境中部署高性能代理系统提供了一条实用的途径。
