The cost and complexity of financial crime compliance (FCC) continue to rise,
often without measurable improvements in effectiveness. While AI offers
potential, most solutions remain opaque and poorly aligned with regulatory
expectations. This paper presents the design and deployment of an agentic AI
system for FCC in digitally native financial platforms. Developed through an
Action Design Research (ADR) process with a fintech firm and regulatory
stakeholders, the system automates onboarding, monitoring, investigation, and
reporting, emphasizing explainability, traceability, and compliance-by-design.
Using artifact-centric modeling, it assigns clearly bounded roles to autonomous
agents and enables task-specific model routing and audit logging. The
contribution includes a reference architecture, a real-world prototype, and
insights into how Agentic AI can reconfigure FCC workflows under regulatory
constraints. Our findings extend IS literature on AI-enabled compliance by
demonstrating how automation, when embedded within accountable governance
structures, can support transparency and institutional trust in high-stakes,
regulated environments.

AI.tldr: 本文设计并部署了一个代理式AI系统，旨在解决金融犯罪合规（FCC）中成本高、效率低且现有AI方案不透明的问题。该系统自动化FCC流程，强调可解释性、可追溯性和合规性，并提供参考架构和原型。
AI.motivation: 金融犯罪合规（FCC）的成本和复杂性持续上升，但效果提升不明显。同时，现有AI解决方案普遍不透明，难以满足监管期望。
AI.method: 通过与金融科技公司及监管方合作，采用行动设计研究（ADR）过程开发。系统利用以制品为中心的建模，为自主代理分配明确角色，实现任务特定模型路由和审计日志记录，以自动化入职、监控、调查和报告等FCC流程，并强调可解释性、可追溯性和合规性设计。
AI.result: 研究成果包括一个参考架构、一个真实世界的原型，并提供了关于代理式AI如何在监管约束下重构FCC工作流的见解。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果通过展示自动化在负责任的治理结构中如何支持高风险、受监管环境中的透明度和机构信任，从而扩展了关于AI辅助合规的信息系统（IS）文献。

title: Towards General Agentic Intelligence via Environment Scaling
summary:
Advanced agentic intelligence is a prerequisite for deploying Large Language
Models in practical, real-world applications. Diverse real-world APIs demand
precise, robust function-calling intelligence, which needs agents to develop
these capabilities through interaction in varied environments. The breadth of
function-calling competence is closely tied to the diversity of environments in
which agents are trained. In this work, we scale up environments as a step
towards advancing general agentic intelligence. This gives rise to two central
challenges: (i) how to scale environments in a principled manner, and (ii) how
to effectively train agentic capabilities from experiences derived through
interactions with these environments. To address these, we design a scalable
framework that automatically constructs heterogeneous environments that are
fully simulated, systematically broadening the space of function-calling
scenarios. We further adapt a two-phase agent fine-tuning strategy: first
endowing agents with fundamental agentic capabilities, then specializing them
for domain-specific contexts. Extensive experiments on agentic benchmarks,
tau-bench, tau2-Bench, and ACEBench, demonstrate that our trained model,
AgentScaler, significantly enhances the function-calling capability of models.

AI.tldr: 为提升大型语言模型（LLM）的通用代理智能和函数调用能力，本文提出AgentScaler，通过构建可扩展的异构模拟环境和采用两阶段微调策略，显著增强了模型在各种代理基准上的性能。
AI.motivation: 将大型语言模型（LLM）应用于实际场景需要先进的代理智能，特别是精确和鲁棒的函数调用能力。这种能力的发展依赖于在多样化环境中进行交互训练。当前主要挑战是如何系统性地扩展训练环境，以及如何从这些经验中有效训练代理能力。
AI.method: 本文设计了一个可扩展的框架，能自动构建完全模拟的异构环境，以系统性地拓宽函数调用场景。此外，采用了一种两阶段的代理微调策略：首先赋予代理基本能力，然后针对特定领域进行专业化。
AI.result: 在tau-bench、tau2-Bench和ACEBench等代理基准测试中，本文训练的模型AgentScaler显著增强了模型的函数调用能力。
AI.conclusion: 通过可扩展的异构环境构建和两阶段的代理微调策略，AgentScaler成功提升了模型的函数调用能力，是向实现通用代理智能迈出的重要一步，有助于LLM在现实世界应用中的部署。

title: RIS-FUSION: Rethinking Text-Driven Infrared and Visible Image Fusion from the Perspective of Referring Image Segmentation
summary:
Text-driven infrared and visible image fusion has gained attention for
enabling natural language to guide the fusion process. However, existing
methods lack a goal-aligned task to supervise and evaluate how effectively the
input text contributes to the fusion outcome. We observe that referring image
segmentation (RIS) and text-driven fusion share a common objective:
highlighting the object referred to by the text. Motivated by this, we propose
RIS-FUSION, a cascaded framework that unifies fusion and RIS through joint
optimization. At its core is the LangGatedFusion module, which injects textual
features into the fusion backbone to enhance semantic alignment. To support
multimodal referring image segmentation task, we introduce MM-RIS, a
large-scale benchmark with 12.5k training and 3.5k testing triplets, each
consisting of an infrared-visible image pair, a segmentation mask, and a
referring expression. Extensive experiments show that RIS-FUSION achieves
state-of-the-art performance, outperforming existing methods by over 11% in
mIoU. Code and dataset will be released at
https://github.com/SijuMa2003/RIS-FUSION.

AI.tldr: 本文提出RIS-FUSION框架，通过联合优化文本引导图像融合与指示性图像分割，解决了现有文本驱动融合方法中缺乏文本贡献监督的问题，实现了最先进的融合性能，并发布了MM-RIS大规模数据集。
AI.motivation: 现有文本驱动的红外与可见光图像融合方法，在监督和评估输入文本对融合结果的贡献方面存在不足。研究者观察到指示性图像分割（RIS）与文本驱动融合在突出文本提及对象上具有共同目标。
AI.method:
1. 提出RIS-FUSION级联框架，通过联合优化融合与RIS任务。
2. 核心组件是LangGatedFusion模块，将文本特征注入融合主干以增强语义对齐。
3. 构建并引入了MM-RIS，一个包含1.25万训练和3.5千测试三元组的大规模多模态指示性图像分割基准数据集。
AI.result: RIS-FUSION实现了最先进的性能，在mIoU指标上超越现有方法11%以上。
AI.conclusion: RIS-FUSION成功地将文本引导融合与指示性图像分割任务统一起来，显著提升了文本驱动的红外与可见光图像融合性能，并为相关研究提供了新的大规模基准。

title: Prediction and Causality of functional MRI and synthetic signal using a Zero-Shot Time-Series Foundation Model
summary:
Time-series forecasting and causal discovery are central in neuroscience, as
predicting brain activity and identifying causal relationships between neural
populations and circuits can shed light on the mechanisms underlying cognition
and disease. With the rise of foundation models, an open question is how they
compare to traditional methods for brain signal forecasting and causality
analysis, and whether they can be applied in a zero-shot setting. In this work,
we evaluate a foundation model against classical methods for inferring
directional interactions from spontaneous brain activity measured with
functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) in humans. Traditional approaches
often rely on Wiener-Granger causality. We tested the forecasting ability of
the foundation model in both zero-shot and fine-tuned settings, and assessed
causality by comparing Granger-like estimates from the model with standard
Granger causality. We validated the approach using synthetic time series
generated from ground-truth causal models, including logistic map coupling and
Ornstein-Uhlenbeck processes. The foundation model achieved competitive
zero-shot forecasting fMRI time series (mean absolute percentage error of 0.55
in controls and 0.27 in patients). Although standard Granger causality did not
show clear quantitative differences between models, the foundation model
provided a more precise detection of causal interactions.
  Overall, these findings suggest that foundation models offer versatility,
strong zero-shot performance, and potential utility for forecasting and causal
discovery in time-series data.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了基础模型在脑信号时间序列预测和因果发现方面的能力，发现其在零样本预测方面表现出色，并能更精确地检测因果交互作用。
AI.motivation: 时间序列预测和因果发现是神经科学的核心问题，对理解认知和疾病机制至关重要。随着基础模型的兴起，需要探究它们在脑信号预测和因果分析方面与传统方法的比较，以及是否能应用于零样本设置。
AI.method: 本研究将一个基础模型与传统方法（如Wiener-Granger因果关系）进行对比，以推断人类静息态fMRI数据中的定向交互。评估了基础模型在零样本和微调设置下的预测能力，并通过比较模型产生的类Granger估计与标准Granger因果关系来评估因果性。该方法通过使用由真实因果模型（包括逻辑映射耦合和Ornstein-Uhlenbeck过程）生成的合成时间序列进行了验证。
AI.result: 基础模型在零样本fMRI时间序列预测方面表现出竞争力（对照组平均绝对百分比误差为0.55，患者组为0.27）。尽管标准Granger因果关系未显示模型间明显的定量差异，但基础模型提供了更精确的因果交互作用检测。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明，基础模型具有多功能性、强大的零样本性能，并有望在时间序列数据的预测和因果发现中发挥作用。

title: G-CSEA: A Graph-Based Conflict Set Extraction Algorithm for Identifying Infeasibility in Pseudo-Boolean Models
comment:
This paper presents G-CSEA, a novel graph-based algorithm for rapidly
  diagnosing infeasibility in workforce scheduling models. Inspired by
  Conflict-Driven Clause Learning (CDCL), our method efficiently extracts a
  compact conflict set from an implication graph, reducing the initial
  constraint set by approximately 94%
summary:
Workforce scheduling involves a variety of rule-based constraints-such as
shift limits, staffing policies, working hour restrictions, and many similar
scheduling rules-which can interact in conflicting ways, leading to infeasible
models. Identifying the underlying causes of such infeasibility is critical for
resolving scheduling issues and restoring feasibility. A common diagnostic
approach is to compute Irreducible Infeasible Subsets (IISs): minimal sets of
constraints that are jointly infeasible but become feasible when any one is
removed. We consider models formulated using pseudo-Boolean constraints with
inequality relations over binary variables, which naturally encode scheduling
logic. Existing IIS extraction methods such as Additive Deletion and
QuickXplain rely on repeated feasibility checks, often incurring large numbers
of solver calls. Dual ray analysis, while effective for LP-based models, may
fail when the relaxed problem is feasible but the underlying pseudo-Boolean
model is not. To address these limitations, we propose Graph-based Conflict Set
Extraction Algorithm (G-CSEA) to extract a conflict set, an approach inspired
by Conflict-Driven Clause Learning (CDCL) in SAT solvers. Our method constructs
an implication graph during constraint propagation and, upon detecting a
conflict, traces all contributing constraints across both decision branches.
The resulting conflict set can optionally be minimized using QuickXplain to
produce an IIS.

AI.tldr: 针对员工排班中因约束冲突导致的不可行模型，现有IIS提取方法存在效率和适用性问题。本文提出G-CSEA算法，受SAT求解器启发，通过构建蕴含图高效提取冲突集，并可进一步最小化为IIS。
AI.motivation: 员工排班涉及多种相互冲突的规则约束，易导致模型不可行。识别不可行性的根本原因（即不可约不可行子集IISs）对解决排班问题至关重要。现有IIS提取方法（如Additive Deletion和QuickXplain）依赖重复可行性检查，导致大量求解器调用，效率低下；而对LP模型有效的对偶射线分析，在伪布尔模型中可能失效。
AI.method: 提出基于图的冲突集提取算法（Graph-based Conflict Set Extraction Algorithm, G-CSEA）。该方法在约束传播过程中构建蕴含图，并在检测到冲突时，追踪决策分支中所有导致冲突的约束以提取冲突集。该方法灵感来源于SAT求解器中的冲突驱动子句学习（Conflict-Driven Clause Learning, CDCL）。提取的冲突集可选择性地使用QuickXplain进行最小化，以生成IIS。
AI.result: G-CSEA算法能够从不可行的伪布尔模型中高效地提取冲突集。该冲突集可通过可选的最小化步骤（使用QuickXplain）生成不可约不可行子集（IIS），从而帮助识别模型不可行性的根本原因。
AI.conclusion: G-CSEA算法为复杂排班问题中伪布尔模型的不可行性诊断提供了一种新颖且可能更有效的方法，通过借鉴SAT求解器的机制，克服了现有IIS提取方法在效率和对伪布尔模型适用性方面的局限性。

title: WebWeaver: Structuring Web-Scale Evidence with Dynamic Outlines for Open-Ended Deep Research
comment: An agent system for open-ended deep research
summary:
This paper tackles open-ended deep research (OEDR), a complex challenge where
AI agents must synthesize vast web-scale information into insightful reports.
Current approaches are plagued by dual-fold limitations: static research
pipelines that decouple planning from evidence acquisition and one-shot
generation paradigms that easily suffer from long-context failure issues like
"loss in the middle" and hallucinations. To address these challenges, we
introduce WebWeaver, a novel dual-agent framework that emulates the human
research process. The planner operates in a dynamic cycle, iteratively
interleaving evidence acquisition with outline optimization to produce a
comprehensive, source-grounded outline linking to a memory bank of evidence.
The writer then executes a hierarchical retrieval and writing process,
composing the report section by section. By performing targeted retrieval of
only the necessary evidence from the memory bank for each part, it effectively
mitigates long-context issues. Our framework establishes a new state-of-the-art
across major OEDR benchmarks, including DeepResearch Bench, DeepConsult, and
DeepResearchGym. These results validate our human-centric, iterative
methodology, demonstrating that adaptive planning and focused synthesis are
crucial for producing high-quality, reliable, and well-structured reports.

AI.tldr: 针对开放式深度研究（OEDR）中AI代理的挑战，本文提出WebWeaver双代理框架，通过动态规划和分层写作模拟人类研究过程，有效解决现有方法的局限性，并在OEDR基准测试中达到SOTA。
AI.motivation: 现有开放式深度研究（OEDR）方法存在两大局限：一是研究流程僵化，规划与证据获取分离；二是采用一次性生成范式，易受长上下文问题（如“中间信息丢失”和幻觉）影响。
AI.method: 提出了WebWeaver双代理框架，模拟人类研究过程。其中，规划器通过动态循环，迭代地将证据获取与大纲优化相结合，生成全面、有来源依据且链接到证据记忆库的大纲。撰写器则执行分层检索和写作过程，针对报告的每个部分从记忆库中精确检索所需证据，逐节撰写报告，有效缓解长上下文问题。
AI.result: 该框架在DeepResearch Bench、DeepConsult和DeepResearchGym等主要开放式深度研究（OEDR）基准测试中均取得了新的最先进（SOTA）成果。
AI.conclusion: 验证了以人为中心、迭代式的方法论，表明自适应规划和专注综合对于生成高质量、可靠且结构良好的报告至关重要。

title: Learning by Imagining: Debiased Feature Augmentation for Compositional Zero-Shot Learning
summary:
Compositional Zero-Shot Learning (CZSL) aims to recognize unseen
attribute-object compositions by learning prior knowledge of seen primitives,
\textit{i.e.}, attributes and objects. Learning generalizable compositional
representations in CZSL remains challenging due to the entangled nature of
attributes and objects as well as the prevalence of long-tailed distributions
in real-world data. Inspired by neuroscientific findings that imagination and
perception share similar neural processes, we propose a novel approach called
Debiased Feature Augmentation (DeFA) to address these challenges. The proposed
DeFA integrates a disentangle-and-reconstruct framework for feature
augmentation with a debiasing strategy. DeFA explicitly leverages the prior
knowledge of seen attributes and objects by synthesizing high-fidelity
composition features to support compositional generalization. Extensive
experiments on three widely used datasets demonstrate that DeFA achieves
state-of-the-art performance in both \textit{closed-world} and
\textit{open-world} settings.

AI.tldr: 提出DeFA方法，通过解耦重构和去偏策略合成高保真特征，解决组合零样本学习（CZSL）中的属性-对象纠缠和长尾分布问题，实现SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: 组合零样本学习（CZSL）面临属性与对象纠缠以及数据长尾分布的挑战，难以学习可泛化的组合表示。
AI.method: 受神经科学启发，提出Debiased Feature Augmentation (DeFA)。该方法结合了用于特征增强的解耦重构框架和去偏策略，通过合成高保真组合特征，显式利用已知属性和对象知识支持组合泛化。
AI.result: 在三个常用数据集上进行的大量实验表明，DeFA在闭域和开域设置中均实现了当前最佳（SOTA）性能。
AI.conclusion: DeFA成功解决了CZSL中的关键挑战，并显著提升了组合泛化能力，达到了领先的研究水平。

title: Phi: Preference Hijacking in Multi-modal Large Language Models at Inference Time
summary:
Recently, Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have gained significant
attention across various domains. However, their widespread adoption has also
raised serious safety concerns. In this paper, we uncover a new safety risk of
MLLMs: the output preference of MLLMs can be arbitrarily manipulated by
carefully optimized images. Such attacks often generate contextually relevant
yet biased responses that are neither overtly harmful nor unethical, making
them difficult to detect. Specifically, we introduce a novel method, Preference
Hijacking (Phi), for manipulating the MLLM response preferences using a
preference hijacked image. Our method works at inference time and requires no
model modifications. Additionally, we introduce a universal hijacking
perturbation -- a transferable component that can be embedded into different
images to hijack MLLM responses toward any attacker-specified preferences.
Experimental results across various tasks demonstrate the effectiveness of our
approach. The code for Phi is accessible at https://github.com/Yifan-Lan/Phi.

AI.tldr: 本文揭示了多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）的一个新安全风险：其输出偏好可通过精心优化的图像被任意操纵。为此，作者提出了Preference Hijacking (Phi)方法，能在推理时无需修改模型地劫持MLLM的响应偏好。
AI.motivation: 多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）虽广受欢迎，但也带来了严重的安全问题。本文旨在揭示MLLMs的一种新安全风险，即其输出偏好可能被精心优化的图像任意操纵，导致生成上下文相关但有偏见的响应，且这些攻击难以检测。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种名为Preference Hijacking (Phi)的新方法，通过“偏好劫持图像”来操纵MLLM的响应偏好。该方法在推理时运行，无需对模型进行任何修改。此外，还引入了一个通用的劫持扰动，这是一个可转移的组件，可以嵌入到不同的图像中，从而将MLLM的响应劫持到攻击者指定的任何偏好。
AI.result: 在各种任务上进行的实验结果表明，所提出的Preference Hijacking (Phi)方法是有效的，能够成功操纵MLLMs的输出偏好。
AI.conclusion: MLLMs存在一个新颖且难以检测的安全风险，即其输出偏好可以被精心设计的图像任意操纵。本文提出的Phi方法有效地展示了这种攻击的可行性，并提供了一种在推理时无需模型修改即可实现偏好劫持的手段。

title: Simulating Clinical AI Assistance using Multimodal LLMs: A Case Study in Diabetic Retinopathy
summary:
Diabetic retinopathy (DR) is a leading cause of blindness worldwide, and AI
systems can expand access to fundus photography screening. Current FDA-cleared
systems primarily provide binary referral outputs, where this minimal output
may limit clinical trust and utility. Yet, determining the most effective
output format to enhance clinician-AI performance is an empirical challenge
that is difficult to assess at scale. We evaluated multimodal large language
models (MLLMs) for DR detection and their ability to simulate clinical AI
assistance across different output types. Two models were tested on IDRiD and
Messidor-2: GPT-4o, a general-purpose MLLM, and MedGemma, an open-source
medical model. Experiments included: (1) baseline evaluation, (2) simulated AI
assistance with synthetic predictions, and (3) actual AI-to-AI collaboration
where GPT-4o incorporated MedGemma outputs. MedGemma outperformed GPT-4o at
baseline, achieving higher sensitivity and AUROC, while GPT-4o showed
near-perfect specificity but low sensitivity. Both models adjusted predictions
based on simulated AI inputs, but GPT-4o's performance collapsed with incorrect
ones, whereas MedGemma remained more stable. In actual collaboration, GPT-4o
achieved strong results when guided by MedGemma's descriptive outputs, even
without direct image access (AUROC up to 0.96). These findings suggest MLLMs
may improve DR screening pipelines and serve as scalable simulators for
studying clinical AI assistance across varying output configurations. Open,
lightweight models such as MedGemma may be especially valuable in low-resource
settings, while descriptive outputs could enhance explainability and clinician
trust in clinical workflows.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了多模态大语言模型（GPT-4o和MedGemma）在糖尿病视网膜病变检测中的应用，并探讨了不同AI输出格式对临床协作的影响。结果显示，MedGemma性能优于GPT-4o，且描述性AI输出能显著提升协作效果和信任度。
AI.motivation: 现有FDA批准的AI系统在糖尿病视网膜病变筛查中仅提供二元转诊输出，这限制了临床信任和实用性。确定最有效的输出格式以增强医生-AI协作性能是一个难以大规模评估的经验性挑战。
AI.method: 研究在IDRiD和Messidor-2数据集上测试了GPT-4o（通用MLLM）和MedGemma（开源医学模型）两种MLLM。实验包括：1) 基线评估，2) 使用合成预测模拟AI辅助，3) 实际的AI-AI协作（GPT-4o整合MedGemma的输出）。
AI.result: 基线评估中，MedGemma在敏感性和AUROC上优于GPT-4o，而GPT-4o具有近乎完美的特异性但敏感性较低。两个模型都能根据模拟AI输入调整预测，但GPT-4o在接收到不正确输入时性能会崩溃，MedGemma则更稳定。在实际协作中，当GPT-4o在MedGemma的描述性输出指导下，即使没有直接图像访问，也取得了高达0.96的AUROC。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现表明，多模态大语言模型有望改进糖尿病视网膜病变筛查流程，并可作为研究临床AI辅助不同输出配置的可扩展模拟器。MedGemma等开放、轻量级模型在低资源环境下可能特别有价值，而描述性输出可以增强临床工作流中的可解释性和医生信任。

title: ReSum: Unlocking Long-Horizon Search Intelligence via Context Summarization
summary:
Large Language Model (LLM)-based web agents demonstrate strong performance on
knowledge-intensive tasks but are hindered by context window limitations in
paradigms like ReAct. Complex queries involving multiple entities, intertwined
relationships, and high uncertainty demand extensive search cycles that rapidly
exhaust context budgets before reaching complete solutions. To overcome this
challenge, we introduce ReSum, a novel paradigm that enables indefinite
exploration through periodic context summarization. ReSum converts growing
interaction histories into compact reasoning states, maintaining awareness of
prior discoveries while bypassing context constraints. For paradigm adaptation,
we propose ReSum-GRPO, integrating GRPO with segmented trajectory training and
advantage broadcasting to familiarize agents with summary-conditioned
reasoning. Extensive experiments on web agents of varying scales across three
benchmarks demonstrate that ReSum delivers an average absolute improvement of
4.5\% over ReAct, with further gains of up to 8.2\% following ReSum-GRPO
training. Notably, with only 1K training samples, our WebResummer-30B (a
ReSum-GRPO-trained version of WebSailor-30B) achieves 33.3\% Pass@1 on
BrowseComp-zh and 18.3\% on BrowseComp-en, surpassing existing open-source web
agents.

AI.tldr: 为解决LLM Web代理的上下文限制，本文提出ReSum范式，通过周期性上下文摘要实现无限探索，并在ReSum-GRPO训练下显著提升了代理性能，超越现有开源代理。
AI.motivation: LLM驱动的Web代理（如ReAct范式）在知识密集型任务中因上下文窗口限制而受阻。处理多实体、复杂关系和高不确定性的查询时，需要大量搜索循环，导致上下文预算迅速耗尽，无法完成解决方案。
AI.method: 引入ReSum范式，通过周期性上下文摘要实现无限探索。ReSum将不断增长的交互历史转化为紧凑的推理状态，从而在保持对先前发现的感知的同时绕过上下文限制。为适应此范式，提出ReSum-GRPO，它结合了GRPO、分段轨迹训练和优势广播，以使代理熟悉摘要条件下的推理。
AI.result: ReSum在三种基准测试中，相对于ReAct实现了平均4.5%的绝对性能提升；经过ReSum-GRPO训练后，性能进一步提升高达8.2%。仅使用1K训练样本，WebResummer-30B（ReSum-GRPO训练版）在BrowseComp-zh上达到33.3%的Pass@1，在BrowseComp-en上达到18.3%，超越了现有的开源Web代理。
AI.conclusion: ReSum通过上下文摘要有效解决了LLM Web代理的上下文窗口限制问题，显著提高了代理在复杂知识密集型任务上的探索能力和性能，并且其训练模型WebResummer-30B在多项基准测试中表现优于现有开源Web代理。

title: AsyMoE: Leveraging Modal Asymmetry for Enhanced Expert Specialization in Large Vision-Language Models
summary:
Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) have demonstrated impressive performance
on multimodal tasks through scaled architectures and extensive training.
However, existing Mixture of Experts (MoE) approaches face challenges due to
the asymmetry between visual and linguistic processing. Visual information is
spatially complete, while language requires maintaining sequential context. As
a result, MoE models struggle to balance modality-specific features and
cross-modal interactions. Through systematic analysis, we observe that language
experts in deeper layers progressively lose contextual grounding and rely more
on parametric knowledge rather than utilizing the provided visual and
linguistic information. To address this, we propose AsyMoE, a novel
architecture that models this asymmetry using three specialized expert groups.
We design intra-modality experts for modality-specific processing, hyperbolic
inter-modality experts for hierarchical cross-modal interactions, and
evidence-priority language experts to suppress parametric biases and maintain
contextual grounding. Extensive experiments demonstrate that AsyMoE achieves
26.58% and 15.45% accuracy improvements over vanilla MoE and modality-specific
MoE respectively, with 25.45% fewer activated parameters than dense models.

AI.tldr: 提出AsyMoE架构，通过三种专业专家组解决大型视觉语言模型（LVLM）中专家混合（MoE）的视觉-语言处理不对称问题，显著提升性能并减少激活参数。
AI.motivation: 现有的LVLM MoE方法在视觉和语言处理之间存在不对称性（视觉信息空间完整，语言需维护序列上下文），导致难以平衡模态特定特征与跨模态交互。深入分析发现，深层语言专家会逐渐失去语境基础，过度依赖参数知识而非利用输入信息。
AI.method: 提出AsyMoE架构，通过三种专业专家组来建模这种不对称性：模态内专家（用于模态特定处理）、双曲跨模态专家（用于分层跨模态交互）和证据优先语言专家（用于抑制参数偏差并保持语境基础）。
AI.result: AsyMoE在准确性上分别比香草MoE和模态特定MoE提高了26.58%和15.45%，同时比密集模型少激活25.45%的参数。
AI.conclusion: AsyMoE通过专业化的专家组有效解决了LVLM中MoE的视觉-语言处理不对称问题，实现了性能和效率的显著提升。

title: Selective Risk Certification for LLM Outputs via Information-Lift Statistics: PAC-Bayes, Robustness, and Skeleton Design
summary:
Large language models often produce plausible but incorrect outputs. Existing
heuristics such as HallBayes lack formal guarantees. We develop the first
comprehensive theory of \emph{information-lift certificates} under selective
classification. Our contributions are: (i) a PAC-Bayes \emph{sub-gamma}
analysis extending beyond standard Bernstein bounds; (ii) explicit skeleton
sensitivity theorems quantifying robustness to misspecification; (iii)
failure-mode guarantees under assumption violations; and (iv) a principled
variational method for skeleton construction. Across six datasets and multiple
model families, we validate assumptions empirically, reduce abstention by
12--15\% at the same risk, and maintain runtime overhead below 20\% (further
reduced via batching).

AI.tldr: 本文提出了首个选择性分类下“信息提升证书”的综合理论，旨在解决大型语言模型输出不准确的问题，能在相同风险下减少12-15%的弃权，且运行时开销低。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）经常产生看似合理但实际上不正确的输出。现有的一些启发式方法（如HallBayes）缺乏形式化的理论保证。
AI.method: 开发了选择性分类下“信息提升证书”的首个综合理论。主要贡献包括：(i) 超越标准Bernstein界限的PAC-Bayes次伽马分析；(ii) 量化对模型误设定鲁棒性的明确骨架敏感度定理；(iii) 在假设不成立情况下的故障模式保证；(iv) 一种构建骨架的原则性变分方法。
AI.result: 在六个数据集和多个模型家族上，经验性地验证了提出的假设，在相同风险水平下，将模型的弃权率降低了12-15%，同时将运行时开销保持在20%以下（通过批处理可进一步降低）。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的信息提升证书理论有效提高了大型语言模型在选择性分类中的可靠性，在相同风险下显著降低了弃权率，并保持了较低的计算开销。

title: A Scenario-Driven Cognitive Approach to Next-Generation AI Memory
summary:
As artificial intelligence advances toward artificial general intelligence
(AGI), the need for robust and human-like memory systems has become
increasingly evident. Current memory architectures often suffer from limited
adaptability, insufficient multimodal integration, and an inability to support
continuous learning. To address these limitations, we propose a scenario-driven
methodology that extracts essential functional requirements from representative
cognitive scenarios, leading to a unified set of design principles for
next-generation AI memory systems. Based on this approach, we introduce the
\textbf{COgnitive Layered Memory Architecture (COLMA)}, a novel framework that
integrates cognitive scenarios, memory processes, and storage mechanisms into a
cohesive design. COLMA provides a structured foundation for developing AI
systems capable of lifelong learning and human-like reasoning, thereby
contributing to the pragmatic development of AGI.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种场景驱动方法，并基于此引入了认知分层记忆架构（COLMA），旨在解决当前AI记忆系统在适应性、多模态集成和持续学习方面的局限性，从而推动通用人工智能（AGI）的发展。
AI.motivation: 随着人工智能向通用人工智能（AGI）迈进，对强大且类人记忆系统的需求日益显著。然而，当前记忆架构普遍存在适应性有限、多模态集成不足以及无法支持持续学习的问题。

title: Do Natural Language Descriptions of Model Activations Convey Privileged Information?
summary:
Recent interpretability methods have proposed to translate LLM internal
representations into natural language descriptions using a second verbalizer
LLM. This is intended to illuminate how the target model represents and
operates on inputs. But do such activation verbalization approaches actually
provide privileged knowledge about the internal workings of the target model,
or do they merely convey information about its inputs? We critically evaluate
popular verbalization methods across datasets used in prior work and find that
they succeed at benchmarks without any access to target model internals,
suggesting that these datasets are not ideal for evaluating verbalization
methods. We then run controlled experiments which reveal that verbalizations
often reflect the parametric knowledge of the verbalizer LLM which generated
them, rather than the activations of the target LLM being decoded. Taken
together, our results indicate a need for targeted benchmarks and experimental
controls to rigorously assess whether verbalization methods provide meaningful
insights into the operations of LLMs.

AI.tldr: LLM口语化解释方法可能未能揭示目标模型的内部机制，而是反映了口语化LLM自身的知识；现有评估基准存在缺陷，需要更严格的评估方法。
AI.motivation: 当前LLM可解释性方法通过“口语化LLM”将目标模型的内部表示转换为自然语言，旨在阐明目标模型的运作方式。但作者质疑这些方法是提供了关于模型内部工作的特权知识，还是仅仅传达了输入信息。
AI.method: 批判性评估了现有工作中流行的口语化方法及其数据集，发现其存在缺陷。随后，作者进行了受控实验。
AI.result: 流行的口语化方法在没有访问目标模型内部的情况下也能通过基准测试，表明现有数据集不适合评估此类方法。受控实验揭示，口语化结果常常反映生成它们的“口语化LLM”的参数知识，而非被解码的目标LLM的激活。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明，需要更有针对性的基准和实验控制，以严格评估口语化方法是否能真正提供对LLM运作的有意义洞察。

title: EvoEmpirBench: Dynamic Spatial Reasoning with Agent-ExpVer
summary:
Most existing spatial reasoning benchmarks focus on static or globally
observable environments, failing to capture the challenges of long-horizon
reasoning and memory utilization under partial observability and dynamic
changes. We introduce two dynamic spatial benchmarks, locally observable maze
navigation and match-2 elimination that systematically evaluate models'
abilities in spatial understanding and adaptive planning when local perception,
environment feedback, and global objectives are tightly coupled. Each action
triggers structural changes in the environment, requiring continuous update of
cognition and strategy. We further propose a subjective experience-based memory
mechanism for cross-task experience transfer and validation. Experiments show
that our benchmarks reveal key limitations of mainstream models in dynamic
spatial reasoning and long-term memory, providing a comprehensive platform for
future methodological advances. Our code and data are available at
https://anonymous.4open.science/r/EvoEmpirBench-143C/.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了两个动态空间推理基准（迷宫导航和匹配消除）和一种记忆机制，揭示了主流模型在动态、部分可观察且需要长时记忆环境中的局限性。
AI.motivation: 现有空间推理基准侧重于静态或全局可观察环境，未能捕捉部分可观察和动态变化下长程推理及记忆利用的挑战。
AI.method: 引入了两个动态空间基准：局部可观察迷宫导航和匹配-2消除，以系统评估模型在局部感知、环境反馈和全局目标紧密耦合时的空间理解和自适应规划能力。这些基准要求模型在每次动作触发环境结构变化时持续更新认知和策略。此外，提出了一种基于主观经验的记忆机制，用于跨任务经验迁移和验证。
AI.result: 实验表明，所提出的基准揭示了主流模型在动态空间推理和长时记忆方面的关键局限性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基准为未来在动态空间推理方法学上的进步提供了一个全面的平台。

title: Graph Homophily Booster: Rethinking the Role of Discrete Features on Heterophilic Graphs
summary:
Graph neural networks (GNNs) have emerged as a powerful tool for modeling
graph-structured data. However, existing GNNs often struggle with heterophilic
graphs, where connected nodes tend to have dissimilar features or labels. While
numerous methods have been proposed to address this challenge, they primarily
focus on architectural designs without directly targeting the root cause of the
heterophily problem. These approaches still perform even worse than the
simplest MLPs on challenging heterophilic datasets. For instance, our
experiments show that 21 latest GNNs still fall behind the MLP on the Actor
dataset. This critical challenge calls for an innovative approach to addressing
graph heterophily beyond architectural designs. To bridge this gap, we propose
and study a new and unexplored paradigm: directly increasing the graph
homophily via a carefully designed graph transformation. In this work, we
present a simple yet effective framework called GRAPHITE to address graph
heterophily. To the best of our knowledge, this work is the first method that
explicitly transforms the graph to directly improve the graph homophily.
Stemmed from the exact definition of homophily, our proposed GRAPHITE creates
feature nodes to facilitate homophilic message passing between nodes that share
similar features. Furthermore, we both theoretically and empirically show that
our proposed GRAPHITE significantly increases the homophily of originally
heterophilic graphs, with only a slight increase in the graph size. Extensive
experiments on challenging datasets demonstrate that our proposed GRAPHITE
significantly outperforms state-of-the-art methods on heterophilic graphs while
achieving comparable accuracy with state-of-the-art methods on homophilic
graphs.

AI.tldr: 本文提出GRAPHITE框架，通过图变换直接增加图的同质性，以解决图神经网络在异质图上性能不佳的问题，并在实验中取得了显著优于现有方法的成果。
AI.motivation: 现有图神经网络（GNNs）在处理异质图（连接节点特征或标签差异大）时表现不佳，主要聚焦于架构设计而非直接解决异质性的根本原因。许多GNNs在挑战性异质数据集上的表现甚至不如简单的MLP，这表明需要一种超越架构设计的新方法来应对图异质性。
AI.method: 本文提出GRAPHITE框架，通过设计图变换来直接增加图的同质性。GRAPHITE通过创建“特征节点”，促进具有相似特征的节点之间进行同质消息传递。这是首个明确通过转换图来直接提高图同质性的方法。
AI.result: 理论和经验研究表明，GRAPHITE能显著提高异质图的同质性，同时仅略微增加图的大小。在挑战性数据集上的广泛实验显示，GRAPHITE在异质图上显著优于最先进的方法，并在同质图上取得了与最先进方法相当的精度。
AI.conclusion: GRAPHITE提供了一个简单而有效的框架，通过直接增加图的同质性，开辟了解决图异质性问题的新范式。它在异质图上表现出色，解决了现有GNNs的痛点，并通过创新性的图变换方法弥补了研究空白。

title: RepIt: Representing Isolated Targets to Steer Language Models
summary:
While activation steering in large language models (LLMs) is a growing area
of research, methods can often incur broader effects than desired. This
motivates isolation of purer concept vectors to enable targeted interventions
and understand LLM behavior at a more granular level. We present RepIt, a
simple and data-efficient framework for isolating concept-specific
representations. Across five frontier LLMs, RepIt enables precise
interventions: it selectively suppresses refusal on targeted concepts while
preserving refusal elsewhere, producing models that answer WMD-related
questions while still scoring as safe on standard benchmarks. We further show
that the corrective signal localizes to just 100-200 neurons and that robust
target representations can be extracted from as few as a dozen examples on a
single A6000. This efficiency raises a dual concern: manipulations can be
performed with modest compute and data to extend to underrepresented
data-scarce topics while evading existing benchmarks. By disentangling refusal
vectors with RepIt, this work demonstrates that targeted interventions can
counteract overgeneralization, laying the foundation for more granular control
of model behavior.

AI.tldr: RepIt是一个简单且数据高效的框架，用于隔离概念特异性表示，实现对LLM行为的精确干预，有效解决过度泛化问题，且所需计算和数据量少。
AI.motivation: LLM中的激活转向方法常产生比预期更广泛的影响。因此，需要隔离更纯粹的概念向量，以实现有针对性的干预并更精细地理解LLM行为。
AI.method: 提出RepIt框架，一个简单且数据高效的方法，用于隔离概念特异性表示。
AI.result: RepIt在五个前沿LLM上实现了精确干预：它选择性地抑制了特定概念（如WMD相关问题）上的拒绝，同时保留了其他方面的拒绝，使模型能回答相关问题但在标准基准测试中仍被评为安全。研究还发现校正信号仅局限于100-200个神经元，并且只需少量（十几个）示例和单个A6000 GPU即可提取稳健的目标表示。这种高效率也引发担忧，即可能被用于以少量计算和数据进行操作并规避现有基准。
AI.conclusion: 通过RepIt解耦拒绝向量，本工作证明了目标干预可以对抗过度泛化，为更细粒度地控制模型行为奠定基础。

title: SPGen: Spherical Projection as Consistent and Flexible Representation for Single Image 3D Shape Generation
summary:
Existing single-view 3D generative models typically adopt multiview diffusion
priors to reconstruct object surfaces, yet they remain prone to inter-view
inconsistencies and are unable to faithfully represent complex internal
structure or nontrivial topologies. In particular, we encode geometry
information by projecting it onto a bounding sphere and unwrapping it into a
compact and structural multi-layer 2D Spherical Projection (SP) representation.
Operating solely in the image domain, SPGen offers three key advantages
simultaneously: (1) Consistency. The injective SP mapping encodes surface
geometry with a single viewpoint which naturally eliminates view inconsistency
and ambiguity; (2) Flexibility. Multi-layer SP maps represent nested internal
structures and support direct lifting to watertight or open 3D surfaces; (3)
Efficiency. The image-domain formulation allows the direct inheritance of
powerful 2D diffusion priors and enables efficient finetuning with limited
computational resources. Extensive experiments demonstrate that SPGen
significantly outperforms existing baselines in geometric quality and
computational efficiency.

AI.tldr: SPGen提出一种基于球面投影（SP）的单视图3D生成模型，通过独特的2D表示解决视图不一致和复杂内部结构表示问题，实现了高几何质量和计算效率。
AI.motivation: 现有单视图3D生成模型依赖多视图扩散先验，导致视图间不一致性，且难以忠实表示复杂的内部结构或非平凡拓扑。
AI.method: 该研究将几何信息投影到边界球并展开成紧凑、结构化的多层2D球面投影（SP）表示。SPGen模型在图像域操作，通过注入式SP映射确保视图一致性，多层SP图支持嵌套内部结构表示，并利用2D扩散先验实现高效微调。
AI.result: 广泛的实验证明，SPGen在几何质量和计算效率方面显著优于现有基线模型。
AI.conclusion: SPGen通过创新的球面投影表示，有效克服了现有单视图3D生成模型在一致性、内部结构表示和效率上的局限性，实现了卓越的性能。

title: Cross-Modal Deep Metric Learning for Time Series Anomaly Detection
summary:
To effectively address the issues of low sensitivity and high time
consumption in time series anomaly detection, we propose an anomaly detection
method based on cross-modal deep metric learning. A cross-modal deep metric
learning feature clustering model is constructed, composed of an input layer, a
triplet selection layer, and a loss function computation layer. The squared
Euclidean distances between cluster centers are calculated, and a stochastic
gradient descent strategy is employed to optimize the model and classify
different time series features. The inner product of principal component
direction vectors is used as a metric for anomaly measurement. The von
Mises-Fisher (vMF) distribution is applied to describe the directional
characteristics of time series data, and historical data is used to train and
obtain evaluation parameters. By comparing the principal component direction
vector of actual time series data with the threshold, anomaly detection is
performed. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed method accurately
classifies time series data with different attributes, exhibits high
sensitivity to anomalies, and achieves high detection accuracy, fast detection
speed, and strong robustness.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于跨模态深度度量学习的时间序列异常检测方法，旨在解决传统方法灵敏度低和耗时高的问题。
AI.motivation: 解决时间序列异常检测中存在的灵敏度低和耗时高的问题。
AI.method: 构建了一个跨模态深度度量学习特征聚类模型，包含输入层、三元组选择层和损失函数计算层。通过计算聚类中心间的欧氏距离平方，并采用随机梯度下降优化模型以分类不同时间序列特征。使用主成分方向向量的内积作为异常测量指标，并利用von Mises-Fisher (vMF) 分布描述时间序列数据的方向性特征。通过历史数据训练获取评估参数，并将实际时间序列数据的主成分方向向量与阈值进行比较以检测异常。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，该方法能准确分类具有不同属性的时间序列数据，对异常具有高灵敏度，并实现了高检测精度、快速检测速度和强鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基于跨模态深度度量学习的异常检测方法有效提升了时间序列异常检测的灵敏度、精度、速度和鲁棒性。

title: Shapes of Cognition for Computational Cognitive Modeling
summary:
Shapes of cognition is a new conceptual paradigm for the computational
cognitive modeling of Language-Endowed Intelligent Agents (LEIAs). Shapes are
remembered constellations of sensory, linguistic, conceptual, episodic, and
procedural knowledge that allow agents to cut through the complexity of real
life the same way as people do: by expecting things to be typical, recognizing
patterns, acting by habit, reasoning by analogy, satisficing, and generally
minimizing cognitive load to the degree situations permit. Atypical outcomes
are treated using shapes-based recovery methods, such as learning on the fly,
asking a human partner for help, or seeking an actionable, even if imperfect,
situational understanding. Although shapes is an umbrella term, it is not
vague: shapes-based modeling involves particular objectives, hypotheses,
modeling strategies, knowledge bases, and actual models of wide-ranging
phenomena, all implemented within a particular cognitive architecture. Such
specificity is needed both to vet our hypotheses and to achieve our practical
aims of building useful agent systems that are explainable, extensible, and
worthy of our trust, even in critical domains. However, although the LEIA
example of shapes-based modeling is specific, the principles can be applied
more broadly, giving new life to knowledge-based and hybrid AI.

AI.tldr: 本文提出“认知形状”作为一种新的计算认知建模范式，旨在使具备语言能力的智能体（LEIA）能像人类一样通过识别模式、习惯行为、类比推理等方式处理复杂现实并最小化认知负荷，同时通过形状恢复方法处理异常情况，以构建可解释、可扩展、值得信赖的智能体系统，并有望振兴知识型和混合型AI。
AI.motivation: 需要一种新的计算认知建模范式来帮助智能体更有效地处理现实世界的复杂性，像人类一样最小化认知负荷，并处理非典型情况。同时，目标是构建可解释、可扩展且在关键领域值得信赖的实用智能体系统。
AI.method: 引入“形状”概念，它是一种记忆化的感觉、语言、概念、情景和程序性知识的组合。智能体利用这些形状来预期典型性、识别模式、习惯性行动、类比推理、满意度以及最小化认知负荷。对于异常结果，采用基于形状的恢复方法（如即时学习、寻求人类帮助、寻求可操作的理解）。此建模范式具有特定的目标、假设、策略、知识库和模型，并在一特定认知架构中实现。
AI.result: 该范式能够构建有用、可解释、可扩展且值得信赖的智能体系统，即使在关键领域也能应用。其原则可更广泛地应用于AI领域，为知识型和混合型AI注入新的活力。
AI.conclusion: “认知形状”提供了一种特定且以人为本的计算认知建模方法，强调认知效率和适应性。其核心原则有望推动可解释、可信赖AI的发展，并为更广泛的AI领域带来新的机遇。

title: Defense-to-Attack: Bypassing Weak Defenses Enables Stronger Jailbreaks in Vision-Language Models
comment: This work has been submitted to the IEEE for possible publication
summary:
Despite their superb capabilities, Vision-Language Models (VLMs) have been
shown to be vulnerable to jailbreak attacks. While recent jailbreaks have
achieved notable progress, their effectiveness and efficiency can still be
improved. In this work, we reveal an interesting phenomenon: incorporating weak
defense into the attack pipeline can significantly enhance both the
effectiveness and the efficiency of jailbreaks on VLMs. Building on this
insight, we propose Defense2Attack, a novel jailbreak method that bypasses the
safety guardrails of VLMs by leveraging defensive patterns to guide jailbreak
prompt design. Specifically, Defense2Attack consists of three key components:
(1) a visual optimizer that embeds universal adversarial perturbations with
affirmative and encouraging semantics; (2) a textual optimizer that refines the
input using a defense-styled prompt; and (3) a red-team suffix generator that
enhances the jailbreak through reinforcement fine-tuning. We empirically
evaluate our method on four VLMs and four safety benchmarks. The results
demonstrate that Defense2Attack achieves superior jailbreak performance in a
single attempt, outperforming state-of-the-art attack methods that often
require multiple tries. Our work offers a new perspective on jailbreaking VLMs.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种新颖的VLM越狱方法Defense2Attack，通过将弱防御机制融入攻击流程，显著提升了越狱的有效性和效率。
AI.motivation: 尽管现有VLM越狱方法取得进展，但其有效性和效率仍有提升空间。研究发现，将弱防御整合到攻击管道中可以显著增强VLM越狱的有效性和效率。
AI.method: Defense2Attack方法包含三个关键组件：1) 视觉优化器，嵌入具有肯定和鼓励语义的通用对抗性扰动；2) 文本优化器，使用防御风格的提示精炼输入；3) 红队后缀生成器，通过强化微调增强越狱。
AI.result: Defense2Attack在四种VLM和四个安全基准上进行评估，结果显示其在单次尝试中取得了卓越的越狱性能，优于通常需要多次尝试的现有最先进攻击方法。
AI.conclusion: 该工作通过利用防御模式指导越狱提示设计，为VLM越狱提供了一个新视角。

title: iCD: A Implicit Clustering Distillation Mathod for Structural Information Mining
summary:
Logit Knowledge Distillation has gained substantial research interest in
recent years due to its simplicity and lack of requirement for intermediate
feature alignment; however, it suffers from limited interpretability in its
decision-making process. To address this, we propose implicit Clustering
Distillation (iCD): a simple and effective method that mines and transfers
interpretable structural knowledge from logits, without requiring ground-truth
labels or feature-space alignment. iCD leverages Gram matrices over decoupled
local logit representations to enable student models to learn latent semantic
structural patterns. Extensive experiments on benchmark datasets demonstrate
the effectiveness of iCD across diverse teacher-student architectures, with
particularly strong performance in fine-grained classification tasks --
achieving a peak improvement of +5.08% over the baseline. The code is available
at: https://github.com/maomaochongaa/iCD.

AI.tldr: 提出隐式聚类蒸馏（iCD），一种简单有效的方法，利用Logit知识蒸馏从解耦的局部Logit表示中挖掘并传递可解释的语义结构知识，在细粒度分类任务中表现优异。
AI.motivation: Logit知识蒸馏因其简单性及无需中间特征对齐而受到关注，但其决策过程解释性有限。
AI.method: 提出隐式聚类蒸馏（iCD），该方法无需真实标签或特征空间对齐，通过利用解耦局部Logit表示上的Gram矩阵，挖掘并传递Logit中可解释的语义结构模式，使学生模型学习潜在的语义结构。
AI.result: 在基准数据集上进行了广泛实验，证明iCD在不同师生架构中均有效，尤其在细粒度分类任务中表现出色，相比基线性能最高提升了+5.08%。
AI.conclusion: iCD通过从Logit中挖掘和传递可解释的结构知识，有效解决了Logit知识蒸馏的解释性限制问题，并在多种任务中，尤其是细粒度分类，取得了显著的性能提升。

title: Scalable RF Simulation in Generative 4D Worlds
summary:
Radio Frequency (RF) sensing has emerged as a powerful, privacy-preserving
alternative to vision-based methods for indoor perception tasks. However,
collecting high-quality RF data in dynamic and diverse indoor environments
remains a major challenge. To address this, we introduce WaveVerse, a
prompt-based, scalable framework that simulates realistic RF signals from
generated indoor scenes with human motions. WaveVerse introduces a
language-guided 4D world generator, which includes a state-aware causal
transformer for human motion generation conditioned on spatial constraints and
texts, and a phase-coherent ray tracing simulator that enables the simulation
of accurate and coherent RF signals. Experiments demonstrate the effectiveness
of our approach in conditioned human motion generation and highlight how phase
coherence is applied to beamforming and respiration monitoring. We further
present two case studies in ML-based high-resolution imaging and human activity
recognition, demonstrating that WaveVerse not only enables data generation for
RF imaging for the first time, but also consistently achieves performance gain
in both data-limited and data-adequate scenarios.

AI.tldr: WaveVerse是一个基于提示的框架，通过语言引导的4D世界生成器和相位一致的射线追踪模拟器，模拟带有复杂人体运动的室内场景的真实射频（RF）信号，以解决RF数据采集挑战。
AI.motivation: 射频（RF）传感是室内感知任务中保护隐私的强大替代方案，但动态多样的室内环境中高质量RF数据采集极具挑战性。
AI.method: 引入WaveVerse框架，包含一个语言引导的4D世界生成器（采用状态感知因果变换器，根据空间约束和文本生成人体运动）和一个相位一致的射线追踪模拟器，用于模拟准确和连贯的RF信号。
AI.result: 实验证明了条件人体运动生成的有效性，展示了相位一致性在波束成形和呼吸监测中的应用。在机器学习（ML）驱动的高分辨率成像和人类活动识别的案例研究中，WaveVerse首次实现了RF成像的数据生成，并在数据受限和数据充足的场景中均获得了性能提升。
AI.conclusion: WaveVerse提供了一个可扩展的RF数据生成解决方案，不仅首次实现了RF成像的数据生成，还在各种ML任务中显著提升了性能，解决了RF数据采集的难题。

title: Effective Gaussian Management for High-fidelity Object Reconstruction
summary:
This paper proposes an effective Gaussian management approach for
high-fidelity object reconstruction. Departing from recent Gaussian Splatting
(GS) methods that employ indiscriminate attribute assignment, our approach
introduces a novel densification strategy that dynamically activates spherical
harmonics (SHs) or normals under the supervision of a surface reconstruction
module, which effectively mitigates the gradient conflicts caused by dual
supervision and achieves superior reconstruction results. To further improve
representation efficiency, we develop a lightweight Gaussian representation
that adaptively adjusts the SH orders of each Gaussian based on gradient
magnitudes and performs task-decoupled pruning to remove Gaussian with minimal
impact on a reconstruction task without sacrificing others, which balances the
representational capacity with parameter quantity. Notably, our management
approach is model-agnostic and can be seamlessly integrated into other
frameworks, enhancing performance while reducing model size. Extensive
experiments demonstrate that our approach consistently outperforms
state-of-the-art approaches in both reconstruction quality and efficiency,
achieving superior performance with significantly fewer parameters.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种高斯管理方法，通过动态激活SH/法线和轻量级高斯表示（自适应SH阶数与任务解耦剪枝），解决了高斯飞溅中的梯度冲突和效率问题，在实现高保真重建的同时，以更少参数显著超越了现有技术。
AI.motivation: 现有高斯飞溅 (GS) 方法采用不加区分的属性分配，导致梯度冲突和表示效率低下。研究动机在于开发一种更有效的高斯管理方法，以实现高保真对象重建并提高表示效率。
AI.method: 1. 引入新颖的致密化策略，在表面重建模块监督下动态激活球面谐波 (SHs) 或法线，以缓解双重监督引起的梯度冲突。 2. 开发轻量级高斯表示，根据梯度幅值自适应调整每个高斯点的SH阶数，并执行任务解耦剪枝，以平衡表示能力与参数数量。 3. 该方法与模型无关，可无缝集成到其他框架中。
AI.result: 在重建质量和效率方面持续优于现有最先进的方法。 以显著更少的参数实现了卓越的性能，同时有效提升性能并减小了模型尺寸。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的高斯管理方法通过创新的致密化策略和轻量级高斯表示，有效解决了现有高斯飞溅方法的局限性，实现了高保真对象重建。 该方法在性能和效率上均优于现有技术，且具有普适性，可集成到其他框架中。

title: No Need for "Learning" to Defer? A Training Free Deferral Framework to Multiple Experts through Conformal Prediction
summary:
AI systems often fail to deliver reliable predictions across all inputs,
prompting the need for hybrid human-AI decision-making. Existing Learning to
Defer (L2D) approaches address this by training deferral models, but these are
sensitive to changes in expert composition and require significant retraining
if experts change. We propose a training-free, model- and expert-agnostic
framework for expert deferral based on conformal prediction. Our method uses
the prediction set generated by a conformal predictor to identify
label-specific uncertainty and selects the most discriminative expert using a
segregativity criterion, measuring how well an expert distinguishes between the
remaining plausible labels. Experiments on CIFAR10-H and ImageNet16-H show that
our method consistently outperforms both the standalone model and the strongest
expert, with accuracies attaining $99.57\pm0.10\%$ and $99.40\pm0.52\%$, while
reducing expert workload by up to a factor of $11$. The method remains robust
under degraded expert performance and shows a gradual performance drop in
low-information settings. These results suggest a scalable, retraining-free
alternative to L2D for real-world human-AI collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种基于保形预测的、无需训练的人机推迟决策框架，能够有效提升预测准确性、降低专家工作量，并克服了传统L2D方法的再训练痛点，为实际人机协作提供了新途径。
AI.motivation: AI系统在所有输入上预测不可靠，需要人机混合决策。现有的学习推迟（L2D）方法对专家组成敏感，且在专家变更时需要大量再训练。
AI.method: 提出一种无需训练、模型和专家无关的专家推迟框架，基于保形预测（conformal prediction）。该方法利用保形预测器生成的预测集识别标签特定不确定性，并通过“分离性准则”选择最具区分性的专家，该准则衡量专家区分剩余可能标签的能力。
AI.result: 在CIFAR10-H和ImageNet16-H上的实验表明，该方法持续优于独立模型和最强专家，准确率分别达到99.57±0.10%和99.40±0.52%，同时专家工作量减少多达11倍。该方法在专家性能下降时仍保持鲁棒性，并在低信息设置下显示出渐进的性能下降。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果表明，该方法为现实世界中人机协作提供了一种可扩展、无需再训练的L2D替代方案。

title: TinyServe: Query-Aware Cache Selection for Efficient LLM Serving
comment:
Accepted to ACM MM as Oral Paper, also accepted to ICML MOSS
  workshop, publicly available as https://openreview.net/forum?id=sOdtl4jLci
summary:
Serving large language models (LLMs) efficiently remains challenging due to
the high memory and latency overhead of key-value (KV) cache access during
autoregressive decoding. We present \textbf{TinyServe}, a lightweight and
extensible serving system for deploying tiny LLMs (e.g., TinyLLaMA, GPT2-345M)
with support for structured KV sparsity, plugin-based token selection, and
hardware-efficient attention kernels. Unlike prior simulation frameworks,
TinyServe executes real-time decoding with configurable sparsity strategies and
fine-grained instrumentation.
  To reduce decoding cost, we introduce a \textit{query-aware page selection}
mechanism that leverages bounding-box metadata to estimate attention relevance
between the query and KV cache blocks. This enables selective KV loading with
minimal overhead and no model modifications. Our fused CUDA kernel integrates
page scoring, sparse memory access, and masked attention in a single pass.
  Experiments show that TinyServe achieves up to \textbf{3.4x} speedup and over
\textbf{2x} memory savings with negligible accuracy drop. Additional analysis
of cache reuse, page hit rate, and multi-GPU scaling confirms its practicality
as an efficient system-level design for LLM training and inference research on
resource-constrained hardware.

AI.tldr: TinyServe是一个轻量级系统，通过引入结构化KV稀疏性和查询感知页面选择机制，显著提升了小型LLM的推理速度（最高3.4倍）并节省内存（超过2倍），且对准确率影响可忽略不计。
AI.motivation: 高效服务大型语言模型（LLMs）面临挑战，主要源于自回归解码过程中键值（KV）缓存访问的高内存和延迟开销。
AI.method: 提出TinyServe系统，专为部署小型LLM（如TinyLLaMA）设计，支持结构化KV稀疏、插件式token选择和硬件高效注意力核。核心方法是“查询感知页面选择”机制，通过利用元数据估计查询与KV缓存块的相关性，实现选择性KV加载。此外，开发了融合CUDA核，将页面评分、稀疏内存访问和掩码注意力整合到单一通道中。
AI.result: 实验结果显示，TinyServe可实现高达3.4倍的推理速度提升和超过2倍的内存节省，同时准确率下降可忽略不计。对缓存复用、页面命中率和多GPU扩展性的分析也进一步证实了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: TinyServe被证实是一个实用且高效的系统级设计，适用于在资源受限硬件上进行LLM训练和推理研究。

title: Exact Coset Sampling for Quantum Lattice Algorithms
summary:
We give a simple, fully correct, and assumption-light replacement for the
contested "domain-extension" in Step 9 of a recent windowed-QFT lattice
algorithm with complex-Gaussian windows~\citep{chen2024quantum}. The published
Step~9 suffers from a periodicity/support mismatch. We present a pair-shift
difference construction that coherently cancels all unknown offsets, produces
an exact uniform CRT-coset state over $\mathbb{Z}_{P}$, and then uses the QFT
to enforce the intended modular linear relation. The unitary is reversible,
uses $\mathrm{poly}(\log M_2)$ gates, and preserves the algorithm's
asymptotics. Project Page: https://github.com/yifanzhang-pro/quantum-lattice.

title: Modelling and analysis of the 8 filters from the "master key filters hypothesis" for depthwise-separable deep networks in relation to idealized receptive fields based on scale-space theory
summary:
This paper presents the results of analysing and modelling a set of 8
``master key filters'', which have been extracted by applying a clustering
approach to the receptive fields learned in depthwise-separable deep networks
based on the ConvNeXt architecture.
  For this purpose, we first compute spatial spread measures in terms of
weighted mean values and weighted variances of the absolute values of the
learned filters, which support the working hypotheses that: (i) the learned
filters can be modelled by separable filtering operations over the spatial
domain, and that (ii) the spatial offsets of the those learned filters that are
non-centered are rather close to half a grid unit. Then, we model the clustered
``master key filters'' in terms of difference operators applied to a spatial
smoothing operation in terms of the discrete analogue of the Gaussian kernel,
and demonstrate that the resulting idealized models of the receptive fields
show good qualitative similarity to the learned filters.
  This modelling is performed in two different ways: (i) using possibly
different values of the scale parameters in the coordinate directions for each
filter, and (ii) using the same value of the scale parameter in both coordinate
directions. Then, we perform the actual model fitting by either (i) requiring
spatial spread measures in terms of spatial variances of the absolute values of
the receptive fields to be equal, or (ii) minimizing the discrete $l_1$- or
$l_2$-norms between the idealized receptive field models and the learned
filters.
  Complementary experimental results then demonstrate the idealized models of
receptive fields have good predictive properties for replacing the learned
filters by idealized filters in depthwise-separable deep networks, thus showing
that the learned filters in depthwise-separable deep networks can be well
approximated by discrete scale-space filters.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析并建模了ConvNeXt深度可分离网络中的“主密钥滤波器”，发现它们可用离散尺度空间滤波器很好地近似，并具有良好的预测能力。
AI.motivation: 旨在理解和建模ConvNeXt深度可分离网络中学习到的感受野（即“主密钥滤波器”），并验证它们是否能用可分离滤波操作和离散尺度空间滤波器进行近似，以获得更具解释性和潜在效率的模型。
AI.method:
1. 对从ConvNeXt深度可分离网络中提取的8个“主密钥滤波器”进行分析。
2. 计算滤波器绝对值的加权均值和加权方差等空间扩散度量，以支持学习到的滤波器可由空间域可分离滤波操作建模，且非中心滤波器空间偏移接近半个网格单元的假设。
3. 使用差分算子应用于高斯核的离散模拟（即离散尺度空间滤波器）来建模聚类的“主密钥滤波器”。
4. 建模过程采用两种方式设置尺度参数：各坐标方向不同或相同。
5. 模型拟合通过两种方式进行：强制感受野绝对值的空间方差相等，或最小化理想模型与学习滤波器之间的离散L1或L2范数。
6. 通过在深度可分离网络中用理想化滤波器替换学习滤波器，评估其预测性能。
AI.result:
1. 计算的空间扩散度量支持了所提出模型的两个工作假设：滤波器可分离，且非中心滤波器的空间偏移接近半个网格单元。
2. 所得的理想化感受野模型与学习到的滤波器表现出良好的定性相似性。
3. 理想化模型在深度可分离网络中替换学习到的滤波器时，展示出良好的预测性能。
AI.conclusion: ConvNeXt深度可分离网络中学习到的滤波器可以被离散尺度空间滤波器很好地近似和建模。这一发现为理解深度网络中的感受野结构提供了新的视角，并可能为设计更可解释或更高效的网络提供基础。

title: Exploring Training Data Attribution under Limited Access Constraints
summary:
Training data attribution (TDA) plays a critical role in understanding the
influence of individual training data points on model predictions.
Gradient-based TDA methods, popularized by \textit{influence function} for
their superior performance, have been widely applied in data selection, data
cleaning, data economics, and fact tracing. However, in real-world scenarios
where commercial models are not publicly accessible and computational resources
are limited, existing TDA methods are often constrained by their reliance on
full model access and high computational costs. This poses significant
challenges to the broader adoption of TDA in practical applications.
  In this work, we present a systematic study of TDA methods under various
access and resource constraints. We investigate the feasibility of performing
TDA under varying levels of access constraints by leveraging appropriately
designed solutions such as proxy models. Besides, we demonstrate that
attribution scores obtained from models without prior training on the target
dataset remain informative across a range of tasks, which is useful for
scenarios where computational resources are limited. Our findings provide
practical guidance for deploying TDA in real-world environments, aiming to
improve feasibility and efficiency under limited access.

AI.tldr: 本文旨在解决现有训练数据归因（TDA）方法在模型不可访问和计算资源有限的现实场景中面临的挑战，通过系统研究并提出代理模型等解决方案，以提高TDA的可行性和效率。
AI.motivation: 现有训练数据归因（TDA）方法依赖于对完整模型的访问和高昂的计算成本，这在商业模型不公开和计算资源有限的实际场景中，严重阻碍了TDA的广泛应用。
AI.method: 本文对在各种访问和资源限制下的TDA方法进行了系统研究。具体方法包括：1) 通过利用代理模型等设计方案，探讨在不同访问限制下执行TDA的可行性；2) 验证未经目标数据集训练的模型所获得的归因分数在多种任务中仍具有信息量，以应对计算资源有限的情况。
AI.result: 研究结果表明，在不同访问限制下执行TDA是可行的（例如通过代理模型）。此外，发现未经目标数据集训练的模型所获得的归因分数在各种任务中仍然具有信息量，这对于计算资源有限的场景非常有用。
AI.conclusion: 本研究的发现为在有限模型访问和计算资源的实际环境中部署TDA提供了实用指导，旨在提高其可行性和效率。

title: What Makes a Good Generated Image? Investigating Human and Multimodal LLM Image Preference Alignment
comment: 7 pages, 9 figures, 3 tables; appendix 16 pages, 9 figures, 6 tables
summary:
Automated evaluation of generative text-to-image models remains a challenging
problem. Recent works have proposed using multimodal LLMs to judge the quality
of images, but these works offer little insight into how multimodal LLMs make
use of concepts relevant to humans, such as image style or composition, to
generate their overall assessment. In this work, we study what attributes of an
image--specifically aesthetics, lack of artifacts, anatomical accuracy,
compositional correctness, object adherence, and style--are important for both
LLMs and humans to make judgments on image quality. We first curate a dataset
of human preferences using synthetically generated image pairs. We use
inter-task correlation between each pair of image quality attributes to
understand which attributes are related in making human judgments. Repeating
the same analysis with LLMs, we find that the relationships between image
quality attributes are much weaker. Finally, we study individual image quality
attributes by generating synthetic datasets with a high degree of control for
each axis. Humans are able to easily judge the quality of an image with respect
to all of the specific image quality attributes (e.g. high vs. low aesthetic
image), however we find that some attributes, such as anatomical accuracy, are
much more difficult for multimodal LLMs to learn to judge. Taken together,
these findings reveal interesting differences between how humans and multimodal
LLMs perceive images.

AI.tldr: 研究发现多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）和人类在评估图像质量时，对图像属性（如美学、构图、解剖准确性等）的感知和判断存在显著差异，尤其在解剖准确性方面MLLMs表现较弱。
AI.motivation: 生成式文本到图像模型的自动化评估仍具挑战。尽管近期研究提出使用多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）评估图像质量，但这些工作缺乏深入了解MLLMs如何利用图像风格、构图等人类相关概念进行整体评估。
AI.method: 研究首先通过人工生成图像对构建人类偏好数据集，并使用任务间相关性分析人类判断中图像质量属性间的关系。然后，对MLLMs重复相同分析。最后，通过高度可控的合成数据集研究各个图像质量属性。
AI.result: 人类在判断图像质量属性时，属性间的关系更强，而MLLMs的属性关系则弱得多。人类能轻松判断所有特定属性的图像质量，但MLLMs在某些属性（如解剖准确性）上学习判断的难度更大。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现揭示了人类和多模态大语言模型在图像感知方面存在的有趣差异。

title: A Multimodal Foundation Model to Enhance Generalizability and Data Efficiency for Pan-cancer Prognosis Prediction
summary:
Multimodal data provides heterogeneous information for a holistic
understanding of the tumor microenvironment. However, existing AI models often
struggle to harness the rich information within multimodal data and extract
poorly generalizable representations. Here we present MICE (Multimodal data
Integration via Collaborative Experts), a multimodal foundation model that
effectively integrates pathology images, clinical reports, and genomics data
for precise pan-cancer prognosis prediction. Instead of conventional
multi-expert modules, MICE employs multiple functionally diverse experts to
comprehensively capture both cross-cancer and cancer-specific insights.
Leveraging data from 11,799 patients across 30 cancer types, we enhanced MICE's
generalizability by coupling contrastive and supervised learning. MICE
outperformed both unimodal and state-of-the-art multi-expert-based multimodal
models, demonstrating substantial improvements in C-index ranging from 3.8% to
11.2% on internal cohorts and 5.8% to 8.8% on independent cohorts,
respectively. Moreover, it exhibited remarkable data efficiency across diverse
clinical scenarios. With its enhanced generalizability and data efficiency,
MICE establishes an effective and scalable foundation for pan-cancer prognosis
prediction, holding strong potential to personalize tailored therapies and
improve treatment outcomes.

AI.tldr: MICE是一个多模态基础模型，通过协作专家整合病理图像、临床报告和基因组数据，实现精确的泛癌预后预测，并在泛化性和数据效率上显著优于现有模型。
AI.motivation: 现有AI模型难以有效利用多模态数据中的丰富信息，提取的表示泛化能力差，而多模态数据对于全面理解肿瘤微环境至关重要。
AI.method: 提出MICE（Multimodal data Integration via Collaborative Experts）模型，它整合病理图像、临床报告和基因组数据。MICE采用功能多样化的专家捕捉跨癌和癌特异性洞察，并结合对比学习和监督学习进行训练，利用来自30种癌症类型、11,799名患者的数据进行泛癌预后预测。
AI.result: MICE在内部和独立队列上均显著优于单模态和现有最先进的多专家多模态模型，C-index分别提升3.8%至11.2%和5.8%至8.8%，同时展现出卓越的数据效率。
AI.conclusion: MICE为泛癌预后预测建立了一个有效且可扩展的基础，具有增强的泛化能力和数据效率，有望实现个性化治疗并改善治疗结果。

title: Context-Aware Language Models for Forecasting Market Impact from Sequences of Financial News
summary:
Financial news plays a critical role in the information diffusion process in
financial markets and is a known driver of stock prices. However, the
information in each news article is not necessarily self-contained, often
requiring a broader understanding of the historical news coverage for accurate
interpretation. Further, identifying and incorporating the most relevant
contextual information presents significant challenges. In this work, we
explore the value of historical context in the ability of large language models
to understand the market impact of financial news. We find that historical
context provides a consistent and significant improvement in performance across
methods and time horizons. To this end, we propose an efficient and effective
contextualization method that uses a large LM to process the main article,
while a small LM encodes the historical context into concise summary embeddings
that are then aligned with the large model's representation space. We explore
the behavior of the model through multiple qualitative and quantitative
interpretability tests and reveal insights into the value of contextualization.
Finally, we demonstrate that the value of historical context in model
predictions has real-world applications, translating to substantial
improvements in simulated investment performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探索了历史背景在大型语言模型理解金融新闻市场影响中的价值，提出了一种大小模型结合的高效语境化方法，并证明历史背景能显著提升模型性能和模拟投资表现。
AI.motivation: 金融新闻是市场信息传播和股价驱动的关键因素，但单篇新闻信息往往不完整，需要历史背景才能准确解读。识别并整合最相关的上下文信息是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 提出一种高效的语境化方法：使用大型语言模型处理主文章，同时小型语言模型将历史背景编码为简洁的摘要嵌入，并将其与大型模型的表示空间对齐。通过多项定性和定量可解释性测试来探索模型行为。
AI.result: 研究发现，历史背景在不同方法和时间范围内都能带来一致且显著的性能提升。模型预测中历史背景的价值具有实际应用，转化为模拟投资性能的大幅改善。
AI.conclusion: 历史背景对于大型语言模型理解金融新闻具有重要价值，能显著提高模型性能，并通过实际应用证明了其在模拟投资中的巨大潜力。

title: Recurrent Cross-View Object Geo-Localization
summary:
Cross-view object geo-localization (CVOGL) aims to determine the location of
a specific object in high-resolution satellite imagery given a query image with
a point prompt. Existing approaches treat CVOGL as a one-shot detection task,
directly regressing object locations from cross-view information aggregation,
but they are vulnerable to feature noise and lack mechanisms for error
correction. In this paper, we propose ReCOT, a Recurrent Cross-view Object
geo-localization Transformer, which reformulates CVOGL as a recurrent
localization task. ReCOT introduces a set of learnable tokens that encode
task-specific intent from the query image and prompt embeddings, and
iteratively attend to the reference features to refine the predicted location.
To enhance this recurrent process, we incorporate two complementary modules:
(1) a SAM-based knowledge distillation strategy that transfers segmentation
priors from the Segment Anything Model (SAM) to provide clearer semantic
guidance without additional inference cost, and (2) a Reference Feature
Enhancement Module (RFEM) that introduces a hierarchical attention to emphasize
object-relevant regions in the reference features. Extensive experiments on
standard CVOGL benchmarks demonstrate that ReCOT achieves state-of-the-art
(SOTA) performance while reducing parameters by 60% compared to previous SOTA
approaches.

AI.tldr: ReCOT是一个循环跨视角目标地理定位Transformer，它将CVOGL重构为循环定位任务，通过迭代细化定位，并结合SAM知识蒸馏和特征增强，实现了SOTA性能且大幅减少了参数。
AI.motivation: 现有跨视角目标地理定位（CVOGL）方法将任务视为一次性检测，易受特征噪声影响且缺乏纠错机制。
AI.method: 提出ReCOT，将CVOGL重构为循环定位任务。ReCOT引入可学习token，通过迭代关注参考特征来细化预测位置。为增强循环过程，引入：1) 基于SAM的知识蒸馏策略，提供清晰的语义指导；2) 引用特征增强模块（RFEM），通过分层注意力强调参考特征中的目标相关区域。
AI.result: 在标准CVOGL基准测试上，ReCOT实现了最先进（SOTA）的性能，同时参数量比现有SOTA方法减少了60%。
AI.conclusion: ReCOT通过创新的循环定位范式、SAM知识蒸馏和RFEM，有效解决了CVOGL中的挑战，显著提升了定位精度和效率。

title: High-Energy Concentration for Federated Learning in Frequency Domain
summary:
Federated Learning (FL) presents significant potential for collaborative
optimization without data sharing. Since synthetic data is sent to the server,
leveraging the popular concept of dataset distillation, this FL framework
protects real data privacy while alleviating data heterogeneity. However, such
methods are still challenged by the redundant information and noise in entire
spatial-domain designs, which inevitably increases the communication burden. In
this paper, we propose a novel Frequency-Domain aware FL method with
high-energy concentration (FedFD) to address this problem. Our FedFD is
inspired by the discovery that the discrete cosine transform predominantly
distributes energy to specific regions, referred to as high-energy
concentration. The principle behind FedFD is that low-energy like
high-frequency components usually contain redundant information and noise, thus
filtering them helps reduce communication costs and optimize performance. Our
FedFD is mathematically formulated to preserve the low-frequency components
using a binary mask, facilitating an optimal solution through frequency-domain
distribution alignment. In particular, real data-driven synthetic
classification is imposed into the loss to enhance the quality of the
low-frequency components. On five image and speech datasets, FedFD achieves
superior performance than state-of-the-art methods while reducing communication
costs. For example, on the CIFAR-10 dataset with Dirichlet coefficient $\alpha
= 0.01$, FedFD achieves a minimum reduction of 37.78\% in the communication
cost, while attaining a 10.88\% performance gain.

AI.tldr: 本文提出FedFD，一种频域感知的联邦学习方法，通过过滤高频冗余信息，显著降低通信成本并提高性能，同时保护隐私。
AI.motivation: 联邦学习中现有的基于数据集蒸馏的方法虽然保护隐私并缓解数据异构性，但空间域设计中的冗余信息和噪声导致通信负担过重。
AI.method: FedFD方法利用离散余弦变换的能量集中特性，通过二进制掩码保留低频分量并过滤高频冗余和噪声。它通过频域分布对齐促进最优解，并在损失函数中引入真实数据驱动的合成分类以增强低频分量的质量。
AI.result: FedFD在五个图像和语音数据集上表现优于现有先进方法。例如，在CIFAR-10数据集上，通信成本至少降低了37.78%，同时性能提升了10.88%。
AI.conclusion: FedFD通过在频域处理数据，有效地解决了联邦学习中的通信冗余问题，同时显著提升了模型性能，为高效且隐私保护的协作优化提供了一种新的解决方案。

title: The Adaptation Paradox: Agency vs. Mimicry in Companion Chatbots
comment:
31 pages, 17 figures, 2 tables. Submitted to CHI 2026 (under review).
  Preregistered: https://osf.io/f4h5b ; Code/Materials:
  https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15801081
summary:
Generative AI powers a growing wave of companion chatbots, yet principles for
fostering genuine connection remain unsettled. We test two routes: visible user
authorship versus covert language-style mimicry. In a preregistered 3x2
experiment (N = 162), we manipulated user-controlled avatar generation (none,
premade, user-generated) and Language Style Matching (LSM) (static vs.
adaptive). Generating an avatar boosted rapport ($\omega^2$ = .040, p = .013),
whereas adaptive LSM underperformed static style on personalization and
satisfaction (d = 0.35, p = .009) and was paradoxically judged less adaptive (t
= 3.07, p = .003, d = 0.48). We term this an Adaptation Paradox: synchrony
erodes connection when perceived as incoherent, destabilizing persona. To
explain, we propose a stability-and-legibility account: visible authorship
fosters natural interaction, while covert mimicry risks incoherence. Our
findings suggest designers should prioritize legible, user-driven
personalization and limit stylistic shifts rather than rely on opaque mimicry.

AI.tldr: 用户生成头像能增强与AI聊天机器人的亲和力，但自适应语言风格模仿反而损害了用户体验，并导致“适应悖论”，即同步性被视为不连贯时会破坏连接。
AI.motivation: 生成式AI聊天机器人日益普及，但如何有效促进用户建立真正的连接尚不明确。本研究旨在检验用户可见的自主权（如生成头像）和隐蔽的语言风格模仿这两种路径的效果。
AI.method: 通过一项预注册的3x2实验（N=162），我们操纵了两个变量：用户控制的头像生成（无、预设、用户生成）和语言风格匹配（LSM）（静态 vs. 自适应）。
AI.result: 结果显示，生成头像显著提升了用户与聊天机器人的亲和力。然而，自适应语言风格匹配在个性化和满意度方面表现不如静态风格，并且讽刺性地被用户评判为适应性更差，我们称之为“适应悖论”。研究提出“稳定性与易读性”理论来解释，认为可见的自主权能促进自然互动，而隐蔽的模仿则可能因不连贯而适得其反。
AI.conclusion: 设计者应优先考虑清晰、用户驱动的个性化方式，并限制不透明的风格转变，而非过度依赖隐蔽的语言风格模仿来建立与AI聊天机器人的有效连接。

title: A-TDOM: Active TDOM via On-the-Fly 3DGS
summary:
True Digital Orthophoto Map (TDOM) serves as a crucial geospatial product in
various fields such as urban management, city planning, land surveying, etc.
However, traditional TDOM generation methods generally rely on a complex
offline photogrammetric pipeline, resulting in delays that hinder real-time
applications. Moreover, the quality of TDOM may degrade due to various
challenges, such as inaccurate camera poses or Digital Surface Model (DSM) and
scene occlusions. To address these challenges, this work introduces A-TDOM, a
near real-time TDOM generation method based on On-the-Fly 3DGS optimization. As
each image is acquired, its pose and sparse point cloud are computed via
On-the-Fly SfM. Then new Gaussians are integrated and optimized into previously
unseen or coarsely reconstructed regions. By integrating with orthogonal
splatting, A-TDOM can render just after each update of a new 3DGS field.
Initial experiments on multiple benchmarks show that the proposed A-TDOM is
capable of actively rendering TDOM in near real-time, with 3DGS optimization
for each new image in seconds while maintaining acceptable rendering quality
and TDOM geometric accuracy.

AI.tldr: 提出A-TDOM，一种基于即时（On-the-Fly）3DGS优化的近实时真数字正射影像图（TDOM）生成方法，解决了传统方法耗时和质量下降的问题。
AI.motivation: 真数字正射影像图（TDOM）在城市管理、规划和测绘等领域至关重要。然而，传统生成方法依赖复杂的离线摄影测量流程，导致延迟，难以支持实时应用；同时，TDOM质量可能因相机姿态、数字地表模型（DSM）不准确或场景遮挡而降低。
AI.method: 引入A-TDOM，一种基于即时3DGS优化的近实时TDOM生成方法。该方法在每获取一张图像时，通过即时SfM计算姿态和稀疏点云；然后将新的高斯函数集成并优化到未见或粗略重建区域；结合正交溅射，在每次新的3DGS场更新后立即进行渲染。
AI.result: 初步实验表明，A-TDOM能够近实时主动渲染TDOM，每张新图像的3DGS优化仅需数秒，同时保持了可接受的渲染质量和TDOM几何精度。
AI.conclusion: A-TDOM通过实时3DGS优化实现了近实时的TDOM生成，有效解决了传统方法的延迟和质量问题，并保持了良好的渲染质量和几何精度。

title: Leveraging Intermediate Representations of Time Series Foundation Models for Anomaly Detection
summary:
Detecting anomalies in time series data is essential for the reliable
operation of many real-world systems. Recently, time series foundation models
(TSFMs) have emerged as a powerful tool for anomaly detection. However,
existing methods typically rely on the final layer's representations of TSFMs,
computing the anomaly score as a reconstruction or forecasting error via a
task-specific head. Instead, we propose TimeRep, a novel anomaly detection
approach that leverages the intermediate layer's representations of TSFMs,
computing the anomaly score as the distance between these representations.
Given a pre-trained TSFM, TimeRep selects the intermediate layer and
patch-token position that yield the most informative representation. TimeRep
forms a reference collection of intermediate representations from the training
data and applies a core-set strategy to reduce its size while maintaining
distributional coverage. During inference, TimeRep computes the anomaly score
for incoming data by measuring the distance between its intermediate
representations and those of the collection. To address concept drift, TimeRep
integrates an adaptation mechanism that, at inference time, augments the
collection exclusively with non-redundant intermediate representations from
incoming data. We conducted extensive experiments on the UCR Anomaly Archive,
which contains 250 univariate time series. TimeRep consistently outperforms a
broad spectrum of state-of-the-art baselines, including non-DL, DL, and
foundation model-based methods.

AI.tldr: TimeRep是一种新型时间序列异常检测方法，它利用时间序列基础模型（TSFM）的中间层表示来计算异常分数，并通过动态适应机制应对概念漂移，在多个最先进基线上表现优异。
AI.motivation: 现有基于时间序列基础模型（TSFM）的异常检测方法通常依赖模型的最终层表示，通过任务特定头部计算重建或预测误差来识别异常，这种方式可能存在局限性。
AI.method: TimeRep方法利用预训练TSFM的中间层表示。它首先选择最具信息量的中间层和patch-token位置，然后从训练数据中构建中间表示的参考集合，并通过core-set策略优化集合大小并保持分布覆盖。在推理阶段，通过测量传入数据的中间表示与参考集合中表示的距离来计算异常分数。为应对概念漂移，TimeRep集成了自适应机制，在推理时仅用传入数据的非冗余中间表示扩充参考集合。
AI.result: 在包含250个单变量时间序列的UCR异常档案库上进行的广泛实验表明，TimeRep持续优于包括非深度学习、深度学习和基于基础模型在内的多种最先进基线方法。
AI.conclusion: TimeRep通过创新性地利用时间序列基础模型的中间层表示并结合有效的集合管理和概念漂移适应机制，显著提升了时间序列异常检测的性能，为该领域提供了新的SOTA解决方案。

title: LEAF: Knowledge Distillation of Text Embedding Models with Teacher-Aligned Representations
summary:
We present LEAF ("Lightweight Embedding Alignment Framework"), a knowledge
distillation framework for text embedding models. A key distinguishing feature
is that our distilled leaf models are aligned to their teacher. In the context
of information retrieval, this allows for flexible asymmetric architectures
where documents are encoded with the larger teacher model, while queries can be
served with the smaller leaf models. We also show that leaf models
automatically inherit MRL and robustness to output quantization whenever these
properties are present in the teacher model, without explicitly training for
them. To demonstrate the capability of our framework we publish leaf-ir, a 23M
parameters information retrieval oriented text embedding model trained using
LEAF, which sets a new state-of-the-art (SOTA) on BEIR, ranking #1 on the
public leaderboard for this benchmark and for models of its size. When run in
asymmetric mode, its retrieval performance is further increased. Our scheme is
however not restricted to the information retrieval setting, and we demonstrate
its wider applicability by synthesizing the multi-task leaf-mt model. This also
sets a new SOTA, ranking #1 on the public MTEB v2 (English) leaderboard for its
size. LEAF is applicable to black-box models and in contrast to other embedding
model training frameworks, it does not require judgments nor hard negatives,
and training can be conducted using small batch sizes. Thus, dataset and
training infrastructure requirements for our framework are modest. We make our
models publicly available under a permissive Apache 2.0 license.

AI.tldr: LEAF是一种轻量级知识蒸馏框架，用于文本嵌入模型，能使小型leaf模型与大型教师模型对齐，支持非对称架构，自动继承教师模型特性，并在BEIR和MTEB v2上实现了SOTA性能，且对训练资源要求较低。
AI.motivation: 提升文本嵌入模型的效率和灵活性，特别是在信息检索等场景中，允许查询使用更小的模型以降低推理成本。同时，解决现有蒸馏方法对判断数据或困难负样本的依赖，降低训练复杂度和资源需求。
AI.method: 提出LEAF (Lightweight Embedding Alignment Framework)，一个知识蒸馏框架。其核心在于使蒸馏后的leaf模型与教师模型对齐。该方法适用于黑盒模型，不要求判断数据或困难负样本，并且支持小批量训练。
AI.result: 1. 蒸馏后的leaf模型与教师模型对齐，支持文档由教师模型编码、查询由leaf模型编码的灵活非对称架构。2. leaf模型能自动继承教师模型的MRL（最大检索长度）和输出量化鲁棒性。3. 基于LEAF训练的leaf-ir（23M参数）在BEIR上达到SOTA，排名第一；非对称模式下检索性能进一步提升。4. 基于LEAF训练的多任务leaf-mt模型在MTEB v2（英语）同等规模模型中也达到SOTA，排名第一。5. 该框架对数据集和训练基础设施要求较低。
AI.conclusion: LEAF是一个高效、灵活且资源友好的文本嵌入模型知识蒸馏框架。它能够生成与教师模型对齐的小型模型，在信息检索和多任务设置中均取得新的SOTA性能，并降低了训练的门槛和复杂性，具有广泛的应用潜力。

title: DyGLNet: Hybrid Global-Local Feature Fusion with Dynamic Upsampling for Medical Image Segmentation
summary:
Medical image segmentation grapples with challenges including multi-scale
lesion variability, ill-defined tissue boundaries, and computationally
intensive processing demands. This paper proposes the DyGLNet, which achieves
efficient and accurate segmentation by fusing global and local features with a
dynamic upsampling mechanism. The model innovatively designs a hybrid feature
extraction module (SHDCBlock), combining single-head self-attention and
multi-scale dilated convolutions to model local details and global context
collaboratively. We further introduce a dynamic adaptive upsampling module
(DyFusionUp) to realize high-fidelity reconstruction of feature maps based on
learnable offsets. Then, a lightweight design is adopted to reduce
computational overhead. Experiments on seven public datasets demonstrate that
DyGLNet outperforms existing methods, particularly excelling in boundary
accuracy and small-object segmentation. Meanwhile, it exhibits lower
computation complexity, enabling an efficient and reliable solution for
clinical medical image analysis. The code will be made available soon.

AI.tldr: DyGLNet通过融合全局和局部特征并采用动态上采样机制，实现了高效准确的医学图像分割，特别擅长处理边界和小目标，同时降低了计算复杂度。
AI.motivation: 医学图像分割面临多尺度病灶变异性、组织边界模糊和计算密集等挑战。
AI.method: 本文提出了DyGLNet模型，通过动态上采样机制融合全局和局部特征。具体包括：1. SHDCBlock混合特征提取模块，结合单头自注意力和多尺度空洞卷积，协同建模局部细节和全局上下文。2. DyFusionUp动态自适应上采样模块，基于可学习偏移实现特征图的高保真重建。3. 采用轻量化设计以减少计算开销。
AI.result: 在七个公共数据集上的实验表明，DyGLNet优于现有方法，特别在边界精度和小目标分割方面表现出色。同时，它展现出更低的计算复杂度。
AI.conclusion: DyGLNet为临床医学图像分析提供了一种高效可靠的解决方案。

title: Instance-level Randomization: Toward More Stable LLM Evaluations
summary:
Evaluations of large language models (LLMs) suffer from instability, where
small changes of random factors such as few-shot examples can lead to drastic
fluctuations of scores and even model rankings. Moreover, different LLMs can
have different preferences for a certain setting of random factors. As a
result, using a fixed setting of random factors, which is often adopted as the
paradigm of current evaluations, can lead to potential unfair comparisons
between LLMs. To mitigate the volatility of evaluations, we first theoretically
analyze the sources of variance induced by changes in random factors. Targeting
these specific sources, we then propose the instance-level randomization (ILR)
method to reduce variance and enhance fairness in model comparisons. Instead of
using a fixed setting across the whole benchmark in a single experiment, we
randomize all factors that affect evaluation scores for every single instance,
run multiple experiments and report the averaged score. Theoretical analyses
and empirical results demonstrate that ILR can reduce the variance and unfair
comparisons caused by random factors, as well as achieve similar robustness
level with less than half computational cost compared with previous methods.

AI.tldr: LLM评估因随机因素而不稳定且不公平。本文提出实例级随机化（ILR）方法，通过实例级随机化并平均得分，有效降低评估方差，提升公平性，并显著降低计算成本。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM评估受随机因素（如few-shot示例）影响，导致分数剧烈波动、模型排名变化，甚至造成LLM间不公平比较。
AI.method: 首先理论分析方差来源，然后提出实例级随机化（ILR）方法。该方法对每个评估实例的随机因素进行随机化，运行多次实验并报告平均得分，而非使用固定设置。
AI.result: 理论分析和实证结果表明，ILR能有效减少随机因素导致的评估方差和不公平比较，并在计算成本不到一半的情况下达到与现有方法相似的鲁棒性水平。
AI.conclusion: ILR方法成功解决了LLM评估的波动性和不公平性问题，提高了评估的准确性和公平性，同时具有更高的计算效率。

title: Ratio1 -- AI meta-OS
summary:
We propose the Ratio1 AI meta-operating system (meta-OS), a decentralized
MLOps protocol that unifies AI model development, deployment, and inference
across heterogeneous edge devices. Its key innovation is an integrated
blockchain-based framework that transforms idle computing resources (laptops,
smartphones, cloud VMs) into a trustless global supercomputer. The architecture
includes novel components: a decentralized authentication layer (dAuth), an
in-memory state database (CSTORE), a distributed storage system (R1FS),
homomorphic encrypted federated learning (EDIL), decentralized container
orchestration (Deeploy) and an oracle network (OracleSync), which collectively
ensure secure, resilient execution of AI pipelines and other container based
apps at scale. The protocol enforces a formal circular token-economic model
combining Proof-of-Availability (PoA) and Proof-of-AI (PoAI) consensus.
Compared to centralized heterogeneous cloud MLOps and existing decentralized
compute platforms, which often lack integrated AI toolchains or trusted Ratio1
node operators (R1OP) mechanics, Ratio1's holistic design lowers barriers for
AI deployment and improves cost-efficiency. We provide mathematical
formulations of its secure licensing and reward protocols, and include
descriptive information for the system architecture and protocol flow. We argue
that our proposed fully functional ecosystem proposes and demonstrates
significant improvements in accessibility, scalability, and security over
existing alternatives.

AI.tldr: Ratio1是一个去中心化的AI元操作系统，利用区块链将闲置计算资源整合为全球可信超级计算机，提供全面的MLOps协议和一套创新组件，旨在提升AI部署的可访问性、可伸缩性和安全性，同时降低成本。
AI.motivation: 现有集中式异构云MLOps平台和去中心化计算平台在整合AI工具链或可信节点操作机制方面存在不足。本研究旨在解决AI模型在异构边缘设备上开发、部署和推理的统一性、安全性和成本效率问题，并降低AI部署的门槛。
AI.method: 1. 提出Ratio1 AI元操作系统，一个去中心化的MLOps协议。2. 核心创新是构建基于区块链的框架，将闲置计算资源（如笔记本电脑、智能手机、云虚拟机）转化为去中心化、无需信任的全球超级计算机。3. 架构包含一系列新型组件：去中心化认证层(dAuth)、内存状态数据库(CSTORE)、分布式存储系统(R1FS)、同态加密联邦学习(EDIL)、去中心化容器编排(Deeploy)和预言机网络(OracleSync)。4. 采用结合Proof-of-Availability (PoA)和Proof-of-AI (PoAI)的循环代币经济模型。5. 提供安全许可和奖励协议的数学公式，并描述系统架构和协议流程。
AI.result: 1. Ratio1的整体设计降低了AI部署的障碍，并提高了成本效率。2. 所提出的系统确保了AI管道和其他基于容器的应用程序的安全、弹性大规模执行。3. 相对于现有替代方案，Ratio1在可访问性、可伸缩性和安全性方面有显著改进。
AI.conclusion: Ratio1 AI元操作系统通过创新地整合区块链技术和一系列专门设计的去中心化组件，成功构建了一个将闲置计算资源转化为可信全球超算的平台。它通过降低部署门槛、提高成本效率以及增强可访问性、可伸缩性和安全性，显著优于现有中心化或去中心化MLOps解决方案，为AI模型在异构边缘设备上的开发、部署和推理提供了统一、安全且高效的框架。

title: Yet Another Watermark for Large Language Models
summary:
Existing watermarking methods for large language models (LLMs) mainly embed
watermark by adjusting the token sampling prediction or post-processing,
lacking intrinsic coupling with LLMs, which may significantly reduce the
semantic quality of the generated marked texts. Traditional watermarking
methods based on training or fine-tuning may be extendable to LLMs. However,
most of them are limited to the white-box scenario, or very time-consuming due
to the massive parameters of LLMs. In this paper, we present a new watermarking
framework for LLMs, where the watermark is embedded into the LLM by
manipulating the internal parameters of the LLM, and can be extracted from the
generated text without accessing the LLM. Comparing with related methods, the
proposed method entangles the watermark with the intrinsic parameters of the
LLM, which better balances the robustness and imperceptibility of the
watermark. Moreover, the proposed method enables us to extract the watermark
under the black-box scenario, which is computationally efficient for use.
Experimental results have also verified the feasibility, superiority and
practicality. This work provides a new perspective different from mainstream
works, which may shed light on future research.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种通过操纵大语言模型（LLM）内部参数进行水印嵌入的新框架，实现了黑盒水印提取，并有效平衡了水印的鲁棒性和不可感知性。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM水印方法缺乏内在耦合，可能显著降低生成文本的语义质量；传统训练/微调方法通常限于白盒场景或计算成本高昂。
AI.method: 提出一种新的LLM水印框架，通过操纵LLM的内部参数来嵌入水印，且水印可在不访问LLM的情况下从生成文本中提取（黑盒提取）。
AI.result: 实验结果验证了所提方法的可行性、优越性和实用性，表明它能更好地平衡水印的鲁棒性和不可感知性，并支持高效的黑盒提取。
AI.conclusion: 该工作提供了一种与主流方法不同的新视角，有望为未来的LLM水印研究带来启发。

title: BATR-FST: Bi-Level Adaptive Token Refinement for Few-Shot Transformers
comment:
This paper has been accepted for publication at the IEEE
  International Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN), Rome, Italy 2025
summary:
Vision Transformers (ViTs) have shown significant promise in computer vision
applications. However, their performance in few-shot learning is limited by
challenges in refining token-level interactions, struggling with limited
training data, and developing a strong inductive bias. Existing methods often
